long_description.last_approved_text: There are signs and portents that the tribes have long learned to identify. When women start weeping blood, when mutations increase and the call of the Manticore is heard over the wind - these are the signs that the Chaos Gods have cast their eyes and that eternal war is at hand. And so the Marauders gather in large numbers, awaiting a "Three-eyed King".

technologies.long_description: There are signs and portents that the tribes have long learned to identify. When women start weeping blood, when mutations increase and the call of the Manticore is heard over the wind - these are the signs that the Chaos Gods have cast their eyes and that eternal war is at hand. And so the Marauders gather in large numbers, awaiting a "Three-eyed King".

short_description.last_approved_text: Let the Marauders gather under their Ruinous masters' eternal gaze.

technologies.short_description: Let the Marauders gather under their Ruinous masters' eternal gaze.

long_description.last_approved_text: Within the Brass Citadel sits Khorne atop a mountain of skulls, each one cleaved from their host in the Blood God's name. This pleases him greatly, for the taller his throne, the higher the death toll, the greater the chaos unleashed. He may even reward those that collect the most with some token gesture or gift, be it a smouldering hide or even a brass collar - such are the ways of the Gods.

technologies.long_description: Within the Brass Citadel sits Khorne atop a mountain of skulls, each one cleaved from their host in the Blood God's name. This pleases him greatly, for the taller his throne, the higher the death toll, the greater the chaos unleashed. He may even reward those that collect the most with some token gesture or gift, be it a smouldering hide or even a brass collar - such are the ways of the Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: Khorne desires skulls, so gifts his followers with the initiative to find them. Every. Single. One.

technologies.short_description: Khorne desires skulls, so gifts his followers with the initiative to find them. Every. Single. One.

long_description.last_approved_text: Once the sacking of a settlement has begun, the correct rituals will not only ensure the place is truly despoiled but also that the Dark Gods themselves see the discord and ruination, be pleased, and look fondly upon their agents. Of course, attracting the attention of the Chaos Gods is not always the best option, for they are fickle, but those who tread the Path to Ruination are clearly not averse to risk.

technologies.long_description: Once the sacking of a settlement has begun, the correct rituals will not only ensure the place is truly despoiled but also that the Dark Gods themselves see the discord and ruination, be pleased, and look fondly upon their agents. Of course, attracting the attention of the Chaos Gods is not always the best option, for they are fickle, but those who tread the Path to Ruination are clearly not averse to risk.

short_description.last_approved_text: Rituals performed to please the Gods may see an increase in favour.

technologies.short_description: Rituals performed to please the Gods may see an increase in favour.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Norse, amongst other Marauder tribes, daub their ragged banners with the shapes and runes of their Gods. Crows and serpents are common sigils, along with skulls and the all-consuming Chaos Star. Then there are the marks that give the true names of the Dark Gods; such runes are not meant for mortal eyes.

technologies.long_description: The Norse, amongst other Marauder tribes, daub their ragged banners with the shapes and runes of their Gods. Crows and serpents are common sigils, along with skulls and the all-consuming Chaos Star. Then there are the marks that give the true names of the Dark Gods; such runes are not meant for mortal eyes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Fell runes that burn the eyes when looked upon adorn Marauder banners, showing a tribe's true devotion.

technologies.short_description: Fell runes that burn the eyes when looked upon adorn Marauder banners, showing a tribe's true devotion.

long_description.last_approved_text: No Marauder Chieftain is elevated to power out of privilege alone. Should the Dark Gods be looking, he will garner the most attention, so must fight for the right to lead. This is why a weak leader will not be tolerated and quickly be challenged to bloody combat. So it has always been amongst the Northmen.

technologies.long_description: No Marauder Chieftain is elevated to power out of privilege alone. Should the Dark Gods be looking, he will garner the most attention, so must fight for the right to lead. This is why a weak leader will not be tolerated and quickly be challenged to bloody combat. So it has always been amongst the Northmen.

short_description.last_approved_text: The names of the worthy, decided by violent duel.

technologies.short_description: The names of the worthy, decided by violent duel.

long_description.last_approved_text: The weak will be culled. For the Northmen, this is as much an absolute truth as the motion of the tides. If a man grows to adulthood without showing a thirst for violence he is likely to be exiled or simply killed. Even those that make it to the raiding parties will be mercilessly left to die if they stumble or fail to keep up; it is merely the act of cutting off a septic limb, lest the host be weakened.

technologies.long_description: The weak will be culled. For the Northmen, this is as much an absolute truth as the motion of the tides. If a man grows to adulthood without showing a thirst for violence he is likely to be exiled or simply killed. Even those that make it to the raiding parties will be mercilessly left to die if they stumble or fail to keep up; it is merely the act of cutting off a septic limb, lest the host be weakened.

short_description.last_approved_text: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

technologies.short_description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

long_description.last_approved_text: Glorifying acts, those that praise the Chaos Gods, may lead to the granting of great favour. A tribute can be simple; a pile of victims' skulls in adulation of Khorne or the daubing of a desecrated temple with the runes of Tzeentch. Whatever the act, the monument itself does not matter as much as the sentiment intended.

technologies.long_description: Glorifying acts, those that praise the Chaos Gods, may lead to the granting of great favour. A tribute can be simple; a pile of victims' skulls in adulation of Khorne or the daubing of a desecrated temple with the runes of Tzeentch. Whatever the act, the monument itself does not matter as much as the sentiment intended.

short_description.last_approved_text: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

technologies.short_description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

long_description.last_approved_text: Dark standards, made in the far north or taken as trophies from campaigns past, are then changed and corrupted by Chaos. What was once the grand heraldry of the southern lands is daubed with the dread symbols of Chaos; withering runes that refuse to remain still even as they are being scrawled.

technologies.long_description: Dark standards, made in the far north or taken as trophies from campaigns past, are then changed and corrupted by Chaos. What was once the grand heraldry of the southern lands is daubed with the dread symbols of Chaos; withering runes that refuse to remain still even as they are being scrawled.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Chaos carry dark banners, bearing sigils and runes that writhe as if alive.

technologies.short_description: The Warriors of Chaos carry dark banners, bearing sigils and runes that writhe as if alive.

long_description.last_approved_text: There are many mortals who vie for even a flicker of the Chaos Gods' attention. Most will be ignored or simply fall by the wayside as another damned soul, but those that aspire to true greatness - they who rise above the ranks of the indeterminate to be chosen - are inexorably linked by fate to the Dark Powers for evermore.

technologies.long_description: There are many mortals who vie for even a flicker of the Chaos Gods' attention. Most will be ignored or simply fall by the wayside as another damned soul, but those that aspire to true greatness - they who rise above the ranks of the indeterminate to be chosen - are inexorably linked by fate to the Dark Powers for evermore.

short_description.last_approved_text: All Chaos Warriors aspire to great deeds in the Chaos Gods' name, for Daemonhood awaits the greatest of their number.

technologies.short_description: All Chaos Warriors aspire to great deeds in the Chaos Gods' name, for Daemonhood awaits the greatest of their number.

long_description.last_approved_text: A special gift for the Forsaken, given freely by the Chaos Gods to their most devout of children. A thousand little blessings can give the receiver many poisonous needle teeth, eye clutches and writhing limbs - the better to ravage and harvest souls for their benefactors. Glorious!

technologies.long_description: A special gift for the Forsaken, given freely by the Chaos Gods to their most devout of children. A thousand little blessings can give the receiver many poisonous needle teeth, eye clutches and writhing limbs - the better to ravage and harvest souls for their benefactors. Glorious!

short_description.last_approved_text: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings, think of all the needle teeth and tentacles it bestows.

technologies.short_description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings, think of all the needle teeth and tentacles it bestows.

long_description.last_approved_text: Chaos Warriors may once have been of men, but donning Chaos Armour has changed them both in body and mind. The touch of a Dark God has denoted them as Warriors for their patron, marked among his possessions. The God, in turn, may gift his chosen ones with a fighting prowess beyond that of normal men so as not to appear lacklustre on the battlefield.

technologies.long_description: Chaos Warriors may once have been of men, but donning Chaos Armour has changed them both in body and mind. The touch of a Dark God has denoted them as Warriors for their patron, marked among his possessions. The God, in turn, may gift his chosen ones with a fighting prowess beyond that of normal men so as not to appear lacklustre on the battlefield.

short_description.last_approved_text: Chaos Warriors have been touched by Chaos, gaining fighting abilities far beyond those of normal men.

technologies.short_description: Chaos Warriors have been touched by Chaos, gaining fighting abilities far beyond those of normal men.

long_description.last_approved_text: Those that shout the Blood God's infamous war cry should expect his attention, even if for the briefest of moments. However, invoking the Fog of War comes at a price. The battle must be won or else it will be Khorne's wrath, and not his favour, that will be in ready supply.

technologies.long_description: Those that shout the Blood God's infamous war cry should expect his attention, even if for the briefest of moments. However, invoking the Fog of War comes at a price. The battle must be won or else it will be Khorne's wrath, and not his favour, that will be in ready supply.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Blood God never tires of hearing the war cry screamed in his name.

technologies.short_description: The Blood God never tires of hearing the war cry screamed in his name.

long_description.last_approved_text: Whether held aloft by plodding infantry or in the arms of a Chaos Knight on hellish steed, the banners and pennants of Chaos mark the regiments that carry them as servants to the Ruinous Powers. The beings that dare march under such diabolic symbols care not for other mortals, but know they act under the eyes of the Chaos Gods, and therefore with a measure of their protection.

technologies.long_description: Whether held aloft by plodding infantry or in the arms of a Chaos Knight on hellish steed, the banners and pennants of Chaos mark the regiments that carry them as servants to the Ruinous Powers. The beings that dare march under such diabolic symbols care not for other mortals, but know they act under the eyes of the Chaos Gods, and therefore with a measure of their protection.

short_description.last_approved_text: Like the banners held by infantry, the Knights of Chaos ride to war with blasphemous pennants.

technologies.short_description: Like the banners held by infantry, the Knights of Chaos ride to war with blasphemous pennants.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Eye of the Gods is constantly roving to find great Champions, diabolical souls or simply mass carnage to cause amusement. Such events and glorifying acts will cause many Chaos Warriors to gather, drawn in the hope that the Dark Gods will glance down and see them, witness their devotion and award the worthy with great power and gifts.

technologies.long_description: The Eye of the Gods is constantly roving to find great Champions, diabolical souls or simply mass carnage to cause amusement. Such events and glorifying acts will cause many Chaos Warriors to gather, drawn in the hope that the Dark Gods will glance down and see them, witness their devotion and award the worthy with great power and gifts.

short_description.last_approved_text: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Chaos Gods will be looking.

technologies.short_description: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Chaos Gods will be looking.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Slaves to Darkness are those most committed to the ruination of the mortal realm. They are the most favoured of the Dark Powers' many mortal servants - the Chosen and the Chaos Knights. It is not for nothing that the Chosen are so called, as it takes a special, extremely twisted being to serve the Gods with such fervour.

technologies.long_description: The Slaves to Darkness are those most committed to the ruination of the mortal realm. They are the most favoured of the Dark Powers' many mortal servants - the Chosen and the Chaos Knights. It is not for nothing that the Chosen are so called, as it takes a special, extremely twisted being to serve the Gods with such fervour.

short_description.last_approved_text: The elite of the Chaos Warriors are the Chosen and the Chaos Knights. They are the Dark Gods' willing slaves.

technologies.short_description: The elite of the Chaos Warriors are the Chosen and the Chaos Knights. They are the Dark Gods' willing slaves.

long_description.last_approved_text: Chaos Armour is a gift from the Gods, an arcane suit of full-plate that is difficult to penetrate with conventional weapons. Yet as blasphemous as it may seem, it can be further improved upon. By inscribing the litanies of hate found in the Liber Malefic, the armour is hardened even more.

technologies.long_description: Chaos Armour is a gift from the Gods, an arcane suit of full-plate that is difficult to penetrate with conventional weapons. Yet as blasphemous as it may seem, it can be further improved upon. By inscribing the litanies of hate found in the Liber Malefic, the armour is hardened even more.

short_description.last_approved_text: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

technologies.short_description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

long_description.last_approved_text: Despite their immortal status, with time being a mere concept to the Chaos Gods, they still grow impatient - willing their followers on to bring about the world's destruction at a quicker pace. Frustrated with the tardiness of their armies, they see fit to gift their servants the ability to march for far longer than their foes.

technologies.long_description: Despite their immortal status, with time being a mere concept to the Chaos Gods, they still grow impatient - willing their followers on to bring about the world's destruction at a quicker pace. Frustrated with the tardiness of their armies, they see fit to gift their servants the ability to march for far longer than their foes.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

technologies.short_description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

long_description.last_approved_text: The world cannot be conquered through close combat alone, despite Khorne's ceaseless demands. As mortal foes use artillery and exotic beasts, then so must the Chaos hordes. The Hellcannons must speak more often, and the Giants of Chaos have swollen muscles. That is what the Ruinous Powers demand, and so it shall be!

technologies.long_description: The world cannot be conquered through close combat alone, despite Khorne's ceaseless demands. As mortal foes use artillery and exotic beasts, then so must the Chaos hordes. The Hellcannons must speak more often, and the Giants of Chaos have swollen muscles. That is what the Ruinous Powers demand, and so it shall be!

short_description.last_approved_text: Powerful beasts and engines are enhanced if under the command of the Dark Gods.

technologies.short_description: Powerful beasts and engines are enhanced if under the command of the Dark Gods.

long_description.last_approved_text: Daemonic Armour is forged within the Realm of Chaos and imbued with Daemon essence. Runes of a Daemon's name are inscribed, binding the magical creature to it and heightening the protective qualities of the plate. The cost - for there is always a cost - is the slow consumption of the bearer's soul.

technologies.long_description: Daemonic Armour is forged within the Realm of Chaos and imbued with Daemon essence. Runes of a Daemon's name are inscribed, binding the magical creature to it and heightening the protective qualities of the plate. The cost - for there is always a cost - is the slow consumption of the bearer's soul.

short_description.last_approved_text: Even more precious than Chaos Armour, this heavy plate is imbued with Daemonic essence.

technologies.short_description: Even more precious than Chaos Armour, this heavy plate is imbued with Daemonic essence.

long_description.last_approved_text: They are Chosen, the greatest of their fell kind. They have the favour of the Dark Gods and with it power and a chance to impress their masters. Such an opportunity is rare and so all of such a rank eagerly seek out retinues to prove just how worthy they really are.

technologies.long_description: They are Chosen, the greatest of their fell kind. They have the favour of the Dark Gods and with it power and a chance to impress their masters. Such an opportunity is rare and so all of such a rank eagerly seek out retinues to prove just how worthy they really are.

short_description.last_approved_text: To be granted such favour is to be given untold power and a chance to rise above the ranks.

technologies.short_description: To be granted such favour is to be given untold power and a chance to rise above the ranks.

long_description.last_approved_text: While many Chaos Knights ride to war with great lances, others brandish a deadly assortment of weapons - from cleavers and war-picks to heavy maces. These items can be imbued with magical power, that - while small compared to that of Archaon's sword - can still be a terrible thing to face. Imagine a whole unit wielding ensorcelled weaponry?

technologies.long_description: While many Chaos Knights ride to war with great lances, others brandish a deadly assortment of weapons - from cleavers and war-picks to heavy maces. These items can be imbued with magical power, that - while small compared to that of Archaon's sword - can still be a terrible thing to face. Imagine a whole unit wielding ensorcelled weaponry?

short_description.last_approved_text: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

technologies.short_description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

long_description.last_approved_text: Daemonic familiars can be messengers for their masters, bringing news to Champions of Chaos or appearing before a trembling foe, spreading malicious discord of the threats that are marching to meet them. They are the rabble-rousers of Chaos, but nothing more than an amusement when compared to the true Heralds of Doom... And where are they? Patience is required for now, for all things come to those who wait...

technologies.long_description: Daemonic familiars can be messengers for their masters, bringing news to Champions of Chaos or appearing before a trembling foe, spreading malicious discord of the threats that are marching to meet them. They are the rabble-rousers of Chaos, but nothing more than an amusement when compared to the true Heralds of Doom... And where are they? Patience is required for now, for all things come to those who wait...

short_description.last_approved_text: Behold the Herald of Doom, a familiar eager to spread discord and panic with news that the Giants come.

technologies.short_description: Behold the Herald of Doom, a familiar eager to spread discord and panic with news that the Giants come.

short_description.last_approved_text: When ultimate power is the prize, expect a perilous journey indeed…

technologies.short_description: When ultimate power is the prize, expect a perilous journey indeed…

short_description.last_approved_text: Chaos is a seductive force.

technologies.short_description: Chaos is a seductive force.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once promises have been made, the Champion is far along the road to damnation.

technologies.short_description: Once promises have been made, the Champion is far along the road to damnation.

short_description.last_approved_text: Final pledges are made by aspirants who have long since bargained away their souls for ultimate power.

technologies.short_description: Final pledges are made by aspirants who have long since bargained away their souls for ultimate power.

short_description.last_approved_text: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

technologies.short_description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some choices require next to no thought whatsoever.

technologies.short_description: Some choices require next to no thought whatsoever.

short_description.last_approved_text: The deep-seated, profoundly-ingrained desire for revenge consumes and drives one forward.

technologies.short_description: The deep-seated, profoundly-ingrained desire for revenge consumes and drives one forward.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ever onwards the Druchii armies march, conflict's breakneck rhythm dictating the pace.

technologies.short_description: Ever onwards the Druchii armies march, conflict's breakneck rhythm dictating the pace.

short_description.last_approved_text: Every aspect of the Druchii world is directed to warfare, as it should be when war is a permanent state of affairs.

technologies.short_description: Every aspect of the Druchii world is directed to warfare, as it should be when war is a permanent state of affairs.

short_description.last_approved_text: Through glorious warfare we may become worthy of Khaine's favour.

technologies.short_description: Through glorious warfare we may become worthy of Khaine's favour.

short_description.last_approved_text: For the Dark Elves, war is transactional - for Druchii blood to be spilled there must be payment, in the form of loot, preferably.

technologies.short_description: For the Dark Elves, war is transactional - for Druchii blood to be spilled there must be payment, in the form of loot, preferably.

short_description.last_approved_text: Letters of Marque may be issued to those who pursue the Witch King's aims as their own.

technologies.short_description: Letters of Marque may be issued to those who pursue the Witch King's aims as their own.

short_description.last_approved_text: You start with not drowning; once that has been achieved, the rest will swiftly follow - unless a watery grave appeals of course.

technologies.short_description: You start with not drowning; once that has been achieved, the rest will swiftly follow - unless a watery grave appeals of course.

short_description.last_approved_text: Definitely not backwards in coming forwards, or indeed when getting stuck in.

technologies.short_description: Definitely not backwards in coming forwards, or indeed when getting stuck in.

short_description.last_approved_text: Start as you mean to go on and your population will never know what they may be missing.

technologies.short_description: Start as you mean to go on and your population will never know what they may be missing.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ah, the suffering. The sweet, sweet suffering.

technologies.short_description: Ah, the suffering. The sweet, sweet suffering.

short_description.last_approved_text: There's always more work to be done and, fortunately, a constant stream of unfortunate wretches whose only option is to do it.

technologies.short_description: There's always more work to be done and, fortunately, a constant stream of unfortunate wretches whose only option is to do it.

short_description.last_approved_text: A whisper here, a murmur there; winning is often most satisfying when others don't know you're playing.

technologies.short_description: A whisper here, a murmur there; winning is often most satisfying when others don't know you're playing.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Steel is only as strong as the hand that wields it.

technologies.short_description: Steel is only as strong as the hand that wields it.

short_description.last_approved_text: You'll like this, it's got a fast-action reload; you can kill the Asur all day long without pausing for more than a second.

technologies.short_description: You'll like this, it's got a fast-action reload; you can kill the Asur all day long without pausing for more than a second.

short_description.last_approved_text: To strike like lightning and then melt away - that is the way of the irregular warrior.

technologies.short_description: To strike like lightning and then melt away - that is the way of the irregular warrior.

short_description.last_approved_text: Who could have imagined that the fingers of slaves would have so many uses?

technologies.short_description: Who could have imagined that the fingers of slaves would have so many uses?

short_description.last_approved_text: The merest swish of leather is enough to make them alert and simply dying to obey.

technologies.short_description: The merest swish of leather is enough to make them alert and simply dying to obey.

short_description.last_approved_text: It does one's temperament good to channel aggression via the appropriate outlet.

technologies.short_description: It does one's temperament good to channel aggression via the appropriate outlet.

short_description.last_approved_text: They *will* obey, their own will buried deep beneath an overwhelming urge to comply.

technologies.short_description: They *will* obey, their own will buried deep beneath an overwhelming urge to comply.

short_description.last_approved_text: Being beaten, half-starved and kept perpetually in darkness coaxes the very best work from the enslaved.

technologies.short_description: Being beaten, half-starved and kept perpetually in darkness coaxes the very best work from the enslaved.

short_description.last_approved_text: It is often necessary to execute a few - publicly of course - to quench the fires of revolt in all the others.

technologies.short_description: It is often necessary to execute a few - publicly of course - to quench the fires of revolt in all the others.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where better to become proficient in the arts of war? Where the very soil is stained with the blood of failure!

technologies.short_description: Where better to become proficient in the arts of war? Where the very soil is stained with the blood of failure!

short_description.last_approved_text: There is no place in the Druchii's empire of cruelty for those of a mild disposition.

technologies.short_description: There is no place in the Druchii's empire of cruelty for those of a mild disposition.

short_description.last_approved_text: Praise him, for he is the God of Murder and the Lord of War. Khaela Mensha Khaine, the Bloody-handed, above all others!

technologies.short_description: Praise him, for he is the God of Murder and the Lord of War. Khaela Mensha Khaine, the Bloody-handed, above all others!

short_description.last_approved_text: A gathering of those perversely in thrall to the Dark Prince, in the hope that his fickle eye be turned - and, thusly, his favour secured.

technologies.short_description: A gathering of those perversely in thrall to the Dark Prince, in the hope that his fickle eye be turned - and, thusly, his favour secured.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Muscle, flesh, and the skeleton that binds them can be finely tuned for maximum violence.

technologies.short_description: Muscle, flesh, and the skeleton that binds them can be finely tuned for maximum violence.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hardest of substances, when heated to the optimum temperature, may be drawn into mail, plate or scale.

technologies.short_description: The hardest of substances, when heated to the optimum temperature, may be drawn into mail, plate or scale.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some creatures have a natural outer carapace, so hard that it may double as armour once removed from its original owner.

technologies.short_description: Some creatures have a natural outer carapace, so hard that it may double as armour once removed from its original owner.

short_description.last_approved_text: To reach certain destinations, one does not always need to see the way.

technologies.short_description: To reach certain destinations, one does not always need to see the way.

short_description.last_approved_text: Society's detritus may yet find gainful employment in the service of the state.

technologies.short_description: Society's detritus may yet find gainful employment in the service of the state.

short_description.last_approved_text: Criminals make surprisingly good guards once it is made abundantly clear that the alternative is death.

technologies.short_description: Criminals make surprisingly good guards once it is made abundantly clear that the alternative is death.

short_description.last_approved_text: They live apart from the rest of Dark Elf society, waging an endless war against the enemies of Malekith.

technologies.short_description: They live apart from the rest of Dark Elf society, waging an endless war against the enemies of Malekith.

short_description.last_approved_text: To the victor go the spoils - be they coin or place or the lives of the defeated.

technologies.short_description: To the victor go the spoils - be they coin or place or the lives of the defeated.

short_description.last_approved_text: When hatred consumes the soul, what other reason can there be to carry on living?

technologies.short_description: When hatred consumes the soul, what other reason can there be to carry on living?

short_description.last_approved_text: Austerity, and the absence of any kind of warmth, can produce unexpectedly-positive results.

technologies.short_description: Austerity, and the absence of any kind of warmth, can produce unexpectedly-positive results.

short_description.last_approved_text: This aeons-old maxim never stops being true, and a most effective stratagem.

technologies.short_description: This aeons-old maxim never stops being true, and a most effective stratagem.

short_description.last_approved_text: In the Elven world, there are none more adept in the ignoble art of stealthy killing.

technologies.short_description: In the Elven world, there are none more adept in the ignoble art of stealthy killing.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to take the Dark Elves' vicious military machine to another level of cruelty altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Used to slaying their own kin at the first sign of fragility or compassion, Naggarothi armies constantly prune their own ranks.

technologies.short_description: Used to slaying their own kin at the first sign of fragility or compassion, Naggarothi armies constantly prune their own ranks.

short_description.last_approved_text: Black steel, mixed with sacrificial blood and etched with powerful runes, makes the best armour produced in Naggarond.

technologies.short_description: Black steel, mixed with sacrificial blood and etched with powerful runes, makes the best armour produced in Naggarond.

short_description.last_approved_text: The ornate, ceremonial weapons used in Khainite rituals give power to subsequent acts of murder carried out in his bloody name.

technologies.short_description: The ornate, ceremonial weapons used in Khainite rituals give power to subsequent acts of murder carried out in his bloody name.

short_description.last_approved_text: The many razor-sharp barbs and hooks may catch an opponent's blade, or rend their flesh.

technologies.short_description: The many razor-sharp barbs and hooks may catch an opponent's blade, or rend their flesh.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dark, feral Cold Ones must be broken to the will of their new masters.

technologies.short_description: The dark, feral Cold Ones must be broken to the will of their new masters.

short_description.last_approved_text: A source of great power, Black Dragon Eggs must be nurtured correctly so their potential is exploited to the fullest extent.

technologies.short_description: A source of great power, Black Dragon Eggs must be nurtured correctly so their potential is exploited to the fullest extent.

short_description.last_approved_text: So ferocious is the Hydra that their ravenous nature has proven the doom of many.

technologies.short_description: So ferocious is the Hydra that their ravenous nature has proven the doom of many.

short_description.last_approved_text: An even more vicious breed of Cold Ones is now being born in captivity, raised on a strict diet of live flesh and warm blood.

technologies.short_description: An even more vicious breed of Cold Ones is now being born in captivity, raised on a strict diet of live flesh and warm blood.

short_description.last_approved_text: Everyone, be they of high or low birth, have good cause to be fearful of who is watching and what they might tell the authorities.

technologies.short_description: Everyone, be they of high or low birth, have good cause to be fearful of who is watching and what they might tell the authorities.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is no tolerance for failure in Naggarond, no matter how trivial the error.

technologies.short_description: There is no tolerance for failure in Naggarond, no matter how trivial the error.

short_description.last_approved_text: For what would the interminable millennia mean, if not for savage cruelty, blood and death?

technologies.short_description: For what would the interminable millennia mean, if not for savage cruelty, blood and death?

short_description.last_approved_text: Every depraved, degenerate, impure licentiousness; everything to excess, for that is the Dark Prince's wish.

technologies.short_description: Every depraved, degenerate, impure licentiousness; everything to excess, for that is the Dark Prince's wish.

short_description.last_approved_text: Where daylight hangs by a lunar noose. And the horned, hidden one is re-invoked.

technologies.short_description: Where daylight hangs by a lunar noose. And the horned, hidden one is re-invoked.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Beastmen have been traversing the deep forests for countless generations. And so the beast-paths have formed, deep ruts hidden in the undergrowth that even the huntsmen of the Empire would struggle to discover. Some beast-paths fall out of use, lost for generations, only to be discovered again by Ungor trackers many years later. These ancient ways are seen as a boon by the Bray-Shamans, their use encouraged to prevent such routes falling into ignorance once again.

technologies.long_description: The Beastmen have been traversing the deep forests for countless generations. And so the beast-paths have formed, deep ruts hidden in the undergrowth that even the huntsmen of the Empire would struggle to discover. Some beast-paths fall out of use, lost for generations, only to be discovered again by Ungor trackers many years later. These ancient ways are seen as a boon by the Bray-Shamans, their use encouraged to prevent such routes falling into ignorance once again.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lost ruts - long-forgotten ways once trod by hoof - have been revealed; the Bray-Shamans urge their use.

technologies.short_description: Lost ruts - long-forgotten ways once trod by hoof - have been revealed; the Bray-Shamans urge their use.

short_description.last_approved_text: Such wondrous blessings from our glorious masters.

technologies.short_description: Such wondrous blessings from our glorious masters.

long_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen are oft creatures of habit, ranging territory familiar to them. However, when the opportunity to hunt fresh blood-grounds comes (perhaps the Bray-Shamans have negotiated with rival tribes or a previous threat has been neutralised) then the Gors will rejoice, for there is no greater joy than hunting in strange lands with fresh scents, new lairs, and greater prey!

technologies.long_description: Beastmen are oft creatures of habit, ranging territory familiar to them. However, when the opportunity to hunt fresh blood-grounds comes (perhaps the Bray-Shamans have negotiated with rival tribes or a previous threat has been neutralised) then the Gors will rejoice, for there is no greater joy than hunting in strange lands with fresh scents, new lairs, and greater prey!

short_description.last_approved_text: Blood-grounds are where the Beastmen range, hunting and slaughtering. New grounds mean fresh prey to sate their hunger.

technologies.short_description: Blood-grounds are where the Beastmen range, hunting and slaughtering. New grounds mean fresh prey to sate their hunger.

long_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen put great stock in their herdstones, for they are physical monuments to their malefic, Chaotic masters. A herdstone inscribed in runes from the dark tongue and washed in blood from a warherd's most hated of enemies will provide a greater bounty than lesser herdstones.

technologies.long_description: Beastmen put great stock in their herdstones, for they are physical monuments to their malefic, Chaotic masters. A herdstone inscribed in runes from the dark tongue and washed in blood from a warherd's most hated of enemies will provide a greater bounty than lesser herdstones.

short_description.last_approved_text: Most bountiful is the herdstone inscribed with the most fell of runes and doused in hated enemy blood.

technologies.short_description: Most bountiful is the herdstone inscribed with the most fell of runes and doused in hated enemy blood.

long_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen prefer close combat. This comes from no place of honour, it is simply what bestial folk do best. Only for results do their raging Gods care, and if this can be achieved by slaying up close - or from a greater distance - then so be it!

technologies.long_description: Beastmen prefer close combat. This comes from no place of honour, it is simply what bestial folk do best. Only for results do their raging Gods care, and if this can be achieved by slaying up close - or from a greater distance - then so be it!

short_description.last_approved_text: Who cares for man-filth honour? Slaying and blood is all the Gods want, even if that is achieved from afar!

technologies.short_description: Who cares for man-filth honour? Slaying and blood is all the Gods want, even if that is achieved from afar!

long_description.last_approved_text: It is always a bit of mystery from where some Beastmen, most notably, Centigors, get their grog or acidic wine. Mostly, it is stolen from more advanced races, but there are rumours of herds stumbling across fermenting fruit and honey and even given rudimentary instructions on how to turn such bounty into liquor by the Bray-Shamans. In any case, Beastmen are full of rage and violence.

technologies.long_description: It is always a bit of mystery from where some Beastmen, most notably, Centigors, get their grog or acidic wine. Mostly, it is stolen from more advanced races, but there are rumours of herds stumbling across fermenting fruit and honey and even given rudimentary instructions on how to turn such bounty into liquor by the Bray-Shamans. In any case, Beastmen are full of rage and violence.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen are not ‘quiet’ revellers; it doesn’t take much to amplify their natural aggression and rage.

technologies.short_description: Beastmen are not ‘quiet’ revellers; it doesn’t take much to amplify their natural aggression and rage.

short_description.last_approved_text: We are Children of Chaos; we embrace our pedigree!

technologies.short_description: We are Children of Chaos; we embrace our pedigree!

long_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen are expert ambushers, using the undergrowth and the secret beast-paths to their advantage, encircling their foes before striking against the enemy from several different directions. The more experienced a warherd becomes the better they ambush, being able to surround their opponents with impressive speed.

technologies.long_description: Beastmen are expert ambushers, using the undergrowth and the secret beast-paths to their advantage, encircling their foes before striking against the enemy from several different directions. The more experienced a warherd becomes the better they ambush, being able to surround their opponents with impressive speed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen excel at ambushing - wiser Gors know all the beast-paths and so can surround their prey more quickly.

technologies.short_description: Beastmen excel at ambushing - wiser Gors know all the beast-paths and so can surround their prey more quickly.

long_description.last_approved_text: There is a reason that the darkest, most fell of rituals are rarely spoken. To utter such things is to risk more than your life - your very soul could be consumed by Daemons as a tasty morsel for the servants of the Chaos Gods if they believe the utterer not worthy enough. Yet a Bray-Shaman who speaks the dark tongue and pleases his masters may see his tribe greatly rewarded.

technologies.long_description: There is a reason that the darkest, most fell of rituals are rarely spoken. To utter such things is to risk more than your life - your very soul could be consumed by Daemons as a tasty morsel for the servants of the Chaos Gods if they believe the utterer not worthy enough. Yet a Bray-Shaman who speaks the dark tongue and pleases his masters may see his tribe greatly rewarded.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most forbidden rituals are enacted by a willing Bray-Shaman, whose soul is forfeit should the fickle Gods decree it.

technologies.short_description: The most forbidden rituals are enacted by a willing Bray-Shaman, whose soul is forfeit should the fickle Gods decree it.

long_description.last_approved_text: While the Dark Gods may favour those mortals who willingly give their souls to Chaos, Beastmen are the true Children of Chaos. They are born or created to be part of Chaos, intrinsically so, rather than persuaded, tempted, or seduced. And so, when the gaze of the Ruinous Powers falls upon the Beastmen, it is as a parent looking upon their quarrelsome children.

technologies.long_description: While the Dark Gods may favour those mortals who willingly give their souls to Chaos, Beastmen are the true Children of Chaos. They are born or created to be part of Chaos, intrinsically so, rather than persuaded, tempted, or seduced. And so, when the gaze of the Ruinous Powers falls upon the Beastmen, it is as a parent looking upon their quarrelsome children.

short_description.last_approved_text: All servants of the Ruinous Powers - horned or no - crave the gaze of the Dark Gods.

technologies.short_description: All servants of the Ruinous Powers - horned or no - crave the gaze of the Dark Gods.

long_description.last_approved_text: If the Beastlord follows the tenets of Slaa - as the Dark Prince is oft-known among the Beastmen - then he will allow his Gors to rut and mewl and wallow in their own fifth, as well as bathe in and consume enemy blood. This leads many Beastmen into a state of euphoria; to become 'gore-drunk'. A generous Beastlord who grants his Gors such a boon will gather many followers.

technologies.long_description: If the Beastlord follows the tenets of Slaa - as the Dark Prince is oft-known among the Beastmen - then he will allow his Gors to rut and mewl and wallow in their own fifth, as well as bathe in and consume enemy blood. This leads many Beastmen into a state of euphoria; to become 'gore-drunk'. A generous Beastlord who grants his Gors such a boon will gather many followers.

short_description.last_approved_text: The knowledge that Gors and Minotaurs may wallow in filth and enemy blood will draw many more from afar.

technologies.short_description: The knowledge that Gors and Minotaurs may wallow in filth and enemy blood will draw many more from afar.

long_description.last_approved_text: Gors will drape themselves in gory tokens and grisly trophies to mark their triumphs. Although the Beastmen have many foes, they take particular delight in despoiling the artefacts and corpses of mankind, for that is a literal sign of their ultimate goal: to end civilisation. To wear such vile icons about its disgusting person empowers the wearer and commands respect.

technologies.long_description: Gors will drape themselves in gory tokens and grisly trophies to mark their triumphs. Although the Beastmen have many foes, they take particular delight in despoiling the artefacts and corpses of mankind, for that is a literal sign of their ultimate goal: to end civilisation. To wear such vile icons about its disgusting person empowers the wearer and commands respect.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beastmen have a penchant for grim fetishes, especially those gathered from mannish foes.

technologies.short_description: Beastmen have a penchant for grim fetishes, especially those gathered from mannish foes.

long_description.last_approved_text: Whether a true-born Gor, or one of the mongrel things that was once a man, a Beastman's heart is wholly owned by Chaos. Yet there are those beasts whose soul is blacker than most; they are the chieftains, Beastlords and other agents of the Dark Powers with the wherewithal or physical might to emerge dominant over the herds.

technologies.long_description: Whether a true-born Gor, or one of the mongrel things that was once a man, a Beastman's heart is wholly owned by Chaos. Yet there are those beasts whose soul is blacker than most; they are the chieftains, Beastlords and other agents of the Dark Powers with the wherewithal or physical might to emerge dominant over the herds.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hearts of Beastmen are blackened with evil, but only those with the darkest of souls rise to prominence.

technologies.short_description: The hearts of Beastmen are blackened with evil, but only those with the darkest of souls rise to prominence.

long_description.last_approved_text: The more Gors and true-horns fight for their place by the side of the Beastlord, the larger the warherds become. The strongest and meanest of these recruits are selected for the Bestigor herds, but for Gors that don't make the cut there remains plenty of opportunity to sow destruction and then - maybe - impress their chieftain in the battles to come.

technologies.long_description: The more Gors and true-horns fight for their place by the side of the Beastlord, the larger the warherds become. The strongest and meanest of these recruits are selected for the Bestigor herds, but for Gors that don't make the cut there remains plenty of opportunity to sow destruction and then - maybe - impress their chieftain in the battles to come.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Gors gather hives of pestilent corruption, fostered by the Beastlords as recruiting grounds for their herds.

technologies.short_description: The Gors gather hives of pestilent corruption, fostered by the Beastlords as recruiting grounds for their herds.

long_description.last_approved_text: Large blades, scavenged from battlefields or stolen from the armouries of man, Dwarf and even Orc, are ideal for larger Gors and Minotaurs. These weapons are prized by the bulkier Beastmen, as a strike from one endowed with bestial muscles is often enough to slice right through the waist of an armoured man.

technologies.long_description: Large blades, scavenged from battlefields or stolen from the armouries of man, Dwarf and even Orc, are ideal for larger Gors and Minotaurs. These weapons are prized by the bulkier Beastmen, as a strike from one endowed with bestial muscles is often enough to slice right through the waist of an armoured man.

short_description.last_approved_text: Larger blades require stronger arms, for those wielding such massive weapons can literally cleave man-filth in twain.

technologies.short_description: Larger blades require stronger arms, for those wielding such massive weapons can literally cleave man-filth in twain.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Gods always have need of willing agents - mortal, horned or otherwise. Should these agents prove useful, then they will be rewarded by the granting of boons and favour. However, to be under the scrutiny of such Dark Powers is often a double-edged blade, for the Gods do not tolerate failure.

technologies.long_description: The Chaos Gods always have need of willing agents - mortal, horned or otherwise. Should these agents prove useful, then they will be rewarded by the granting of boons and favour. However, to be under the scrutiny of such Dark Powers is often a double-edged blade, for the Gods do not tolerate failure.

short_description.last_approved_text: An agent of the Chaos Gods, acting in their stead, will be granted favour… until they fail.

technologies.short_description: An agent of the Chaos Gods, acting in their stead, will be granted favour… until they fail.

short_description.last_approved_text: Slay the unwilling during blackest night in view of the Dark Moon.

technologies.short_description: Slay the unwilling during blackest night in view of the Dark Moon.

long_description.last_approved_text: In the north, the Everchosen makes his plans, but the Cloven Ones have much say in the Old World's fate also. Such dark times - such days of wrath - will be a chance for all Beastmen to be touched by Chaos - to feel the Dark Powers' strength ooze into their twisted souls.

technologies.long_description: In the north, the Everchosen makes his plans, but the Cloven Ones have much say in the Old World's fate also. Such dark times - such days of wrath - will be a chance for all Beastmen to be touched by Chaos - to feel the Dark Powers' strength ooze into their twisted souls.

short_description.last_approved_text: On such dire days - on the eve of the End Times - all the Cloven Ones are empowered.

technologies.short_description: On such dire days - on the eve of the End Times - all the Cloven Ones are empowered.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Beastmen have always hunted the blood-grounds for quarry. Nowadays, things are no different, but should whispers of a brayherd spread then the herds will come in force and Gors from far-afield tribes join, for their is much glory in raiding and murdering in the name of the Dark Gods.

technologies.long_description: The Beastmen have always hunted the blood-grounds for quarry. Nowadays, things are no different, but should whispers of a brayherd spread then the herds will come in force and Gors from far-afield tribes join, for their is much glory in raiding and murdering in the name of the Dark Gods.

short_description.last_approved_text: The hunt is eternal; it never began, it shall never end. It always was.

technologies.short_description: The hunt is eternal; it never began, it shall never end. It always was.

long_description.last_approved_text: Ragush of the Bloody Horn was a monstrous Doombull that put the poor town of Kalkengard to the torch. Its defenders were rounded up and the choicest mortals eaten, but those left alive after the Minotaurs and Gors had feasted faced a far more horrible fate. They were hung from the burnt ruins, rocky spires, and trees in the area. Whenever the herds of Ragush hungered, they would return to the larder to feed. It is a brutish concept that other warherds have doubtless copied.

technologies.long_description: Ragush of the Bloody Horn was a monstrous Doombull that put the poor town of Kalkengard to the torch. Its defenders were rounded up and the choicest mortals eaten, but those left alive after the Minotaurs and Gors had feasted faced a far more horrible fate. They were hung from the burnt ruins, rocky spires, and trees in the area. Whenever the herds of Ragush hungered, they would return to the larder to feed. It is a brutish concept that other warherds have doubtless copied.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pity the poor defenders of Kalkengard, hung from its trees and ruined, rocky spires as meat for hungry Minotaurs.

technologies.short_description: Pity the poor defenders of Kalkengard, hung from its trees and ruined, rocky spires as meat for hungry Minotaurs.

long_description.last_approved_text: It is on the path to war that the brayherds must travel. If a Beastlord is to rise in power and stature, then he must make battle with man and fellow Gor, Greenskin and rat-filth, beardling and fey tree-clinger alike. All must fall before the blades and horns of Chaos' Children - all must die by the Beastmen's bray!

technologies.long_description: It is on the path to war that the brayherds must travel. If a Beastlord is to rise in power and stature, then he must make battle with man and fellow Gor, Greenskin and rat-filth, beardling and fey tree-clinger alike. All must fall before the blades and horns of Chaos' Children - all must die by the Beastmen's bray!

short_description.last_approved_text: On war's path tread the slaves to darkness; the lost, the damned, and the behorned.

technologies.short_description: On war's path tread the slaves to darkness; the lost, the damned, and the behorned.

long_description.last_approved_text: The rewards of Ruin are hate, rage, fury, and a vile vigour that keeps the Gors fighting fit; it is said to be a "dark blessing". The Chaos Gods demand their servants be of rude health, so that they may despoil and destroy in their twisted, Ruinous name.

technologies.long_description: The rewards of Ruin are hate, rage, fury, and a vile vigour that keeps the Gors fighting fit; it is said to be a "dark blessing". The Chaos Gods demand their servants be of rude health, so that they may despoil and destroy in their twisted, Ruinous name.

short_description.last_approved_text: Should the warherds please their Dark Masters they are blessed with a dark fortitude.

technologies.short_description: Should the warherds please their Dark Masters they are blessed with a dark fortitude.

short_description.last_approved_text: Plant the seed and watch corruption blossom.

technologies.short_description: Plant the seed and watch corruption blossom.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Bray-Shamans claim that only true-horns can tame a Razorgor - the fierce porcine beasts of rage and burden - for they share a common link. Both are savage and when their eyes meet there is a common bond and hatred of everything that is not of the wild.

technologies.long_description: The Bray-Shamans claim that only true-horns can tame a Razorgor - the fierce porcine beasts of rage and burden - for they share a common link. Both are savage and when their eyes meet there is a common bond and hatred of everything that is not of the wild.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gors of purest, spiteful intent. It is no wonder they share a bond with the lesser beasts.

technologies.short_description: Gors of purest, spiteful intent. It is no wonder they share a bond with the lesser beasts.

long_description.last_approved_text: Although Bray-Shamans receive more disturbing dreams and visions than other Gors, the Gods choose other conduits as needed to project their Ruinous will upon their minions. Such visions may be hard to interpret but other episodes are easier to understand and act upon.

technologies.long_description: Although Bray-Shamans receive more disturbing dreams and visions than other Gors, the Gods choose other conduits as needed to project their Ruinous will upon their minions. Such visions may be hard to interpret but other episodes are easier to understand and act upon.

short_description.last_approved_text: When a Beastman is visited by twisted visions, it knows its Ruinous Masters have delivered a message, a clue, or a boon…

technologies.short_description: When a Beastman is visited by twisted visions, it knows its Ruinous Masters have delivered a message, a clue, or a boon…

long_description.last_approved_text: All Beastmen are fell-tempered beasts, but some are quicker to rage than others; considered to be touched by the Granter of Savage Hate and known as 'Khorngors' by some. A wise Beastlord will bind such creatures together in herds and send them forth into the thick of the fighting.

technologies.long_description: All Beastmen are fell-tempered beasts, but some are quicker to rage than others; considered to be touched by the Granter of Savage Hate and known as 'Khorngors' by some. A wise Beastlord will bind such creatures together in herds and send them forth into the thick of the fighting.

short_description.last_approved_text: Quick to temper and impossible to tame, such fierceness should be fostered if it cannot be controlled.

technologies.short_description: Quick to temper and impossible to tame, such fierceness should be fostered if it cannot be controlled.

short_description.last_approved_text: Praise the power of Chaos, and revel in its bounties.

technologies.short_description: Praise the power of Chaos, and revel in its bounties.

long_description.last_approved_text: Though Asuryan enjoys the title 'Creator', and is considered the highest of the Elven pantheon by the High Elves, he is just another deity to the Wood Elves of Athel Loren. In the Pantheonic Mandela of the Asrai he is banished to the outer circle, while Kurnous and Isha take pride of place at the centre.

technologies.long_description: Though Asuryan enjoys the title 'Creator', and is considered the highest of the Elven pantheon by the High Elves, he is just another deity to the Wood Elves of Athel Loren. In the Pantheonic Mandela of the Asrai he is banished to the outer circle, while Kurnous and Isha take pride of place at the centre.

short_description.last_approved_text: The aloof creator of the Elves keeps his thoughts and plans well hidden from mortal eyes.

technologies.short_description: The aloof creator of the Elves keeps his thoughts and plans well hidden from mortal eyes.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Elven Pantheon is split into two distinct groups, the Cadai and the Cytharai. The Cadai are the gods of the heavens and are openly worshipped by all the Asrai. The Cytharai, on the other hand, are the gods of the Underworld, or Mirai, and are often appeased rather than worshipped. As the Elves of Athel Loren are free to worship as they choose, their are those who take the Cytharai to heart; rumours say that the warriors of the Pine Crags have forsaken Kurnous for his vengeful counterpart, Anaeth Raema.

technologies.long_description: The Elven Pantheon is split into two distinct groups, the Cadai and the Cytharai. The Cadai are the gods of the heavens and are openly worshipped by all the Asrai. The Cytharai, on the other hand, are the gods of the Underworld, or Mirai, and are often appeased rather than worshipped. As the Elves of Athel Loren are free to worship as they choose, their are those who take the Cytharai to heart; rumours say that the warriors of the Pine Crags have forsaken Kurnous for his vengeful counterpart, Anaeth Raema.

short_description.last_approved_text: As the rulers of the heavens, the Cadai watch over the Asrai.

technologies.short_description: As the rulers of the heavens, the Cadai watch over the Asrai.

long_description.last_approved_text: Hoeth is the Lord of Wisdom and it is said that he shared the wisdom of the gods with the first Elves. Asuryan was enraged by his actions and as a punishment set Hoeth's great library ablaze. He is the deity of choice for those seeking greater understanding, those who wish to know more of the world and their place in it.

technologies.long_description: Hoeth is the Lord of Wisdom and it is said that he shared the wisdom of the gods with the first Elves. Asuryan was enraged by his actions and as a punishment set Hoeth's great library ablaze. He is the deity of choice for those seeking greater understanding, those who wish to know more of the world and their place in it.

short_description.last_approved_text: Only a fool claims to have nothing to learn, the wise seek the guidance of Hoeth, Lord of Wisdom.

technologies.short_description: Only a fool claims to have nothing to learn, the wise seek the guidance of Hoeth, Lord of Wisdom.

long_description.last_approved_text: Isha is mother to all. The legends of Athel Loren tell that Asuryan forbade her from involving herself in the lives of her mortal children. Heart broken by this decree, she chose to take mortal form along with her consort, the God of the Hunt, Kurnous. Together they became Ariel and Orion, and Athel Loren was transformed into a realm divinely blessed.

technologies.long_description: Isha is mother to all. The legends of Athel Loren tell that Asuryan forbade her from involving herself in the lives of her mortal children. Heart broken by this decree, she chose to take mortal form along with her consort, the God of the Hunt, Kurnous. Together they became Ariel and Orion, and Athel Loren was transformed into a realm divinely blessed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

technologies.short_description: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

long_description.last_approved_text: Isha is mother to all. The legends of Athel Loren tell that Asuryan forbade her from involving herself in the lives of her mortal children. Heart broken by this decree, she chose to take mortal form along with her consort, the God of the Hunt, Kurnous. Together they became Ariel and Orion, and Athel Loren was transformed into a realm divinely blessed.

technologies.long_description: Isha is mother to all. The legends of Athel Loren tell that Asuryan forbade her from involving herself in the lives of her mortal children. Heart broken by this decree, she chose to take mortal form along with her consort, the God of the Hunt, Kurnous. Together they became Ariel and Orion, and Athel Loren was transformed into a realm divinely blessed.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

technologies.short_description: Goddess of the Harvest and Bountiful Land, Isha is beloved by all the Elves of Athel Loren.

long_description.last_approved_text: As the God of the Hunt, Kurnous embodies much of what it means to be Asrai and as such is held in high esteem by all the Elves of Athel Loren. In his mortal form, as the god-king Orion, his life is tied to the seasons. Born anew each Spring, he walks willingly into his funeral pyre come Midwinter. This is not before he has led his people on the Wild Hunt, a call of the wild that sees even the most civilised of the Asrai abandon themselves to their primal urges for its duration, allowing peaceful coexistence for the rest of the year.

technologies.long_description: As the God of the Hunt, Kurnous embodies much of what it means to be Asrai and as such is held in high esteem by all the Elves of Athel Loren. In his mortal form, as the god-king Orion, his life is tied to the seasons. Born anew each Spring, he walks willingly into his funeral pyre come Midwinter. This is not before he has led his people on the Wild Hunt, a call of the wild that sees even the most civilised of the Asrai abandon themselves to their primal urges for its duration, allowing peaceful coexistence for the rest of the year.

short_description.last_approved_text: This powerful God of the Hunt sits side by side with his immortal love, Isha, at the heart of the Elven pantheon.

technologies.short_description: This powerful God of the Hunt sits side by side with his immortal love, Isha, at the heart of the Elven pantheon.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Lady of the Mists is the patron of those who travel the wilderness and protector of all that is lost or hidden. There are many Elves in Athel Loren who chose to live in the wilderness rather than suffer the dull life of a courtier. Waywatchers and Waystalkers feel the call of the forest coursing through their veins and find, from an early age, that they are more at home in the wild places of the Deepwood than in the halls of their kin.

technologies.long_description: The Lady of the Mists is the patron of those who travel the wilderness and protector of all that is lost or hidden. There are many Elves in Athel Loren who chose to live in the wilderness rather than suffer the dull life of a courtier. Waywatchers and Waystalkers feel the call of the forest coursing through their veins and find, from an early age, that they are more at home in the wild places of the Deepwood than in the halls of their kin.

short_description.last_approved_text: Protector of all that is hidden and lost, Ladrielle comes to the aid of those who wander the dark places of the world.

technologies.short_description: Protector of all that is hidden and lost, Ladrielle comes to the aid of those who wander the dark places of the world.

long_description.last_approved_text: Like many of her fellows, Lileath seldom involves herself directly in the affairs of the Elves, choosing instead to send messages through the medium of dream. This Goddess of the Moon and patron of seers, scholars and mages is said to be able to see the true intent of one's heart. She does not judge based on what an Elf does, but on what he intends to do.

technologies.long_description: Like many of her fellows, Lileath seldom involves herself directly in the affairs of the Elves, choosing instead to send messages through the medium of dream. This Goddess of the Moon and patron of seers, scholars and mages is said to be able to see the true intent of one's heart. She does not judge based on what an Elf does, but on what he intends to do.

short_description.last_approved_text: When Elves dreams of a great undertaking, it is Lileath whispering to them as they sleep.

technologies.short_description: When Elves dreams of a great undertaking, it is Lileath whispering to them as they sleep.

long_description.last_approved_text: Loec the Trickster is beloved of Wardancers and all those who tell the history of Athel Loren through song and dance. He is a benevolent deity who gifts his followers with cat-like grace; all he asks in return is unswerving loyalty and ritual war dances. However, Loec's love does not end when an Elf leaves the mortal realm. He has even been known to steal souls from Slaanesh, using his cunning and intellect to win their freedom from an eternity of torment.

technologies.long_description: Loec the Trickster is beloved of Wardancers and all those who tell the history of Athel Loren through song and dance. He is a benevolent deity who gifts his followers with cat-like grace; all he asks in return is unswerving loyalty and ritual war dances. However, Loec's love does not end when an Elf leaves the mortal realm. He has even been known to steal souls from Slaanesh, using his cunning and intellect to win their freedom from an eternity of torment.

short_description.last_approved_text: Loec the Trickster protects the souls of Wood Elves from Slaanesh's perverse, Ruinous reach.

technologies.short_description: Loec the Trickster protects the souls of Wood Elves from Slaanesh's perverse, Ruinous reach.

long_description.last_approved_text: Older than the forest itself, the Ancients of Athel Loren are to be revered and feared. Sadly, many of them have passed into memory and those that survive to this day are not the gentle forest spirits of old, but vengeful guardians bent on protecting their home no matter the cost. When an Ancient dies, their essence is absorbed back into the forest and all their wisdom passes on to their fellows. Only two remain, possessed of the knowledge and pain of all their fallen brethren.

technologies.long_description: Older than the forest itself, the Ancients of Athel Loren are to be revered and feared. Sadly, many of them have passed into memory and those that survive to this day are not the gentle forest spirits of old, but vengeful guardians bent on protecting their home no matter the cost. When an Ancient dies, their essence is absorbed back into the forest and all their wisdom passes on to their fellows. Only two remain, possessed of the knowledge and pain of all their fallen brethren.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wisest of all who dwell in the forest of Athel Loren, the Ancients have forgotten more than most Elves learn in a lifetime.

technologies.short_description: Wisest of all who dwell in the forest of Athel Loren, the Ancients have forgotten more than most Elves learn in a lifetime.

long_description.last_approved_text: The battles that raged between the gods in millennia past had many casualties, and Vaul was chief amongst them. Wounded by Khaine, Vaul is both blind and crippled, but this does nothing to lessen his skill. He is the God of the Forge and patron to all those who work an anvil. He toils endlessly, creating weapons of great power to pass on to the Elves, for he has seen their doom and knows they will need all the help they can get.

technologies.long_description: The battles that raged between the gods in millennia past had many casualties, and Vaul was chief amongst them. Wounded by Khaine, Vaul is both blind and crippled, but this does nothing to lessen his skill. He is the God of the Forge and patron to all those who work an anvil. He toils endlessly, creating weapons of great power to pass on to the Elves, for he has seen their doom and knows they will need all the help they can get.

short_description.last_approved_text: Vaul the Maker works tirelessly to craft weapons to aid the Elves in the battles to come.

technologies.short_description: Vaul the Maker works tirelessly to craft weapons to aid the Elves in the battles to come.

long_description.last_approved_text: Addaioth is known as the Bringer of Wrath and Fire, and is one of the few Ellinilli to survive the trick played on their father by the Trickster God, Loec. Unlike his siblings, who fled and hid from their father, he met him in battle and the two fought for three days and three nights. However, Addaioth was no match for his father. Luckily for him, Ladrielle saw his predicament and blinded Ellinill, spiriting Addaioth away to the mortal realm.

technologies.long_description: Addaioth is known as the Bringer of Wrath and Fire, and is one of the few Ellinilli to survive the trick played on their father by the Trickster God, Loec. Unlike his siblings, who fled and hid from their father, he met him in battle and the two fought for three days and three nights. However, Addaioth was no match for his father. Luckily for him, Ladrielle saw his predicament and blinded Ellinill, spiriting Addaioth away to the mortal realm.

short_description.last_approved_text: Wrath and fire - the gifts that Addaioth offers those who worship him.

technologies.short_description: Wrath and fire - the gifts that Addaioth offers those who worship him.

long_description.last_approved_text: This vengeful goddess is known as the Savage Huntress. Where Kurnous teaches his followers that to take from the forest without giving back is wrong, Anath Raema encourages it. It is said that she once had feelings for Kurnous but he spurned her affections and it was rejection that turned her heart to vengeance. Though her worship is frowned upon in the high courts of Athel Loren, there are whispers that the warriors of the Pine Crags have chosen her over Kurnous.

technologies.long_description: This vengeful goddess is known as the Savage Huntress. Where Kurnous teaches his followers that to take from the forest without giving back is wrong, Anath Raema encourages it. It is said that she once had feelings for Kurnous but he spurned her affections and it was rejection that turned her heart to vengeance. Though her worship is frowned upon in the high courts of Athel Loren, there are whispers that the warriors of the Pine Crags have chosen her over Kurnous.

short_description.last_approved_text: Goddess of the Savage Hunt and woman spurned, Anath Raema's heart rots with vengeance.

technologies.short_description: Goddess of the Savage Hunt and woman spurned, Anath Raema's heart rots with vengeance.

long_description.last_approved_text: This Elven goddess has the power to turn mortal men into bowing supplicants, she is a master seductress and can see the deepest desires of any Elf's heart. This makes her a dangerous deity to follow - she encourages her followers to completely give themselves over to their desires at the cost of all else. She is also the sister of Hekarti and the two have a fierce rivalry.

technologies.long_description: This Elven goddess has the power to turn mortal men into bowing supplicants, she is a master seductress and can see the deepest desires of any Elf's heart. This makes her a dangerous deity to follow - she encourages her followers to completely give themselves over to their desires at the cost of all else. She is also the sister of Hekarti and the two have a fierce rivalry.

short_description.last_approved_text: They who give themselves over to the pursuit of pleasure would do well to court the favour of Atharti.

technologies.short_description: They who give themselves over to the pursuit of pleasure would do well to court the favour of Atharti.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Elven Pantheon is split into two distinct groups, the Cadai and the Cytharai. The Cadai are the Gods of the Heavens and are openly worshipped by all the Asrai. The Cytharai, on the other hand, are the Gods of the Underworld, or Mirai, and are often appeased rather than worshipped. As the Elves of Athel Loren are free to worship as they choose, their are those who take the Cytharai to heart; rumours say that the warriors of the Pine Crags have forsaken Kurnous for his vengeful counterpart, Anaeth Raema.

technologies.long_description: The Elven Pantheon is split into two distinct groups, the Cadai and the Cytharai. The Cadai are the Gods of the Heavens and are openly worshipped by all the Asrai. The Cytharai, on the other hand, are the Gods of the Underworld, or Mirai, and are often appeased rather than worshipped. As the Elves of Athel Loren are free to worship as they choose, their are those who take the Cytharai to heart; rumours say that the warriors of the Pine Crags have forsaken Kurnous for his vengeful counterpart, Anaeth Raema.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Gods of the Underworld are treacherous, but their power is undeniable.

technologies.short_description: The Gods of the Underworld are treacherous, but their power is undeniable.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Queen of Vengeance, Drakira, is ever ready to help an Elf seeking retribution for some slight or other. She choses to spend her time away from the other gods and as such is the favoured goddess of the Waystalkers, who prefer to spend their time deep in the forest. Though Drakira is quick to grant her gifts, they seldom come without a price and she is just as quick to claim that in payment.

technologies.long_description: The Queen of Vengeance, Drakira, is ever ready to help an Elf seeking retribution for some slight or other. She choses to spend her time away from the other gods and as such is the favoured goddess of the Waystalkers, who prefer to spend their time deep in the forest. Though Drakira is quick to grant her gifts, they seldom come without a price and she is just as quick to claim that in payment.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those who seek a quiet life, away from society, honour Drakira.

technologies.short_description: Those who seek a quiet life, away from society, honour Drakira.

long_description.last_approved_text: As the patron of duellists, Eldrazor is venerated by those who fight for honour. This makes him particularly popular with the Eternal Guard, who are often called upon to fight trials by combat in the name of their Lord. To fight in the Arena of Blades is the highest honour an Eternal Guard can hope to achieve. Not only because it is a mortal extension of Eldrazor's Arena of Death, but also because by sacrificing his life he could save thousands of others.

technologies.long_description: As the patron of duellists, Eldrazor is venerated by those who fight for honour. This makes him particularly popular with the Eternal Guard, who are often called upon to fight trials by combat in the name of their Lord. To fight in the Arena of Blades is the highest honour an Eternal Guard can hope to achieve.
