short_description.last_approved_text: Skink warriors are lightly armoured and best-used for skirmish duties in battle.

technologies.short_description: Skink warriors are lightly armoured and best-used for skirmish duties in battle.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whereby Skinks are trained for battle, focusing on use of their natural agility to damage the foe.

technologies.short_description: Whereby Skinks are trained for battle, focusing on use of their natural agility to damage the foe.

short_description.last_approved_text: Of the myriad jungle plants, some are poisonous while others stimulate and rejuvenate the Skinks.

technologies.short_description: Of the myriad jungle plants, some are poisonous while others stimulate and rejuvenate the Skinks.

short_description.last_approved_text: Speed and dexterity on the battlefield are the watchwords here.

technologies.short_description: Speed and dexterity on the battlefield are the watchwords here.

short_description.last_approved_text: As some of the strongest Lizardmen, Kroxigors use their bulk to charge and smash through enemy ranks.

technologies.short_description: As some of the strongest Lizardmen, Kroxigors use their bulk to charge and smash through enemy ranks.

short_description.last_approved_text: By the application of natural sap, the armoured bulk of the Kroxigors can be further strengthened so they survive longer in battle.

technologies.short_description: By the application of natural sap, the armoured bulk of the Kroxigors can be further strengthened so they survive longer in battle.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Lizardmen's Great Plan even further.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Lizardmen's Great Plan even further.

short_description.last_approved_text: This sequence further improves the process of weapon manufacture, ensuring that the Saurus have the very best equipment with which to fight.

technologies.short_description: This sequence further improves the process of weapon manufacture, ensuring that the Saurus have the very best equipment with which to fight.

short_description.last_approved_text: Each spawning of Saurus act as one on the battlefield, acting in a perfectly coordinated manner to crush the enemies of the Old Ones.

technologies.short_description: Each spawning of Saurus act as one on the battlefield, acting in a perfectly coordinated manner to crush the enemies of the Old Ones.

short_description.last_approved_text: Of the myriad jungle plants, some are poisonous while others stimulate and rejuvenate the Saurus.

technologies.short_description: Of the myriad jungle plants, some are poisonous while others stimulate and rejuvenate the Saurus.

short_description.last_approved_text: Gold, found in abundance in Lustria, is used to fashion exquisite armour to cover those parts the Lizardmen's tough scales do not.

technologies.short_description: Gold, found in abundance in Lustria, is used to fashion exquisite armour to cover those parts the Lizardmen's tough scales do not.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most respected of all Saurus Warriors, the Temple Guard are equipped with the finest arms and armour available.

technologies.short_description: The most respected of all Saurus Warriors, the Temple Guard are equipped with the finest arms and armour available.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Temple Guard, veterans all and many thousands of years old, are a pinnacle to which all Saurus aspire.

technologies.short_description: The Temple Guard, veterans all and many thousands of years old, are a pinnacle to which all Saurus aspire.

short_description.last_approved_text: As described by the Old Ones, research the following items to advance the Lizardmen's Great Plan to its ultimate conclusion.

technologies.short_description: As described by the Old Ones, research the following items to advance the Lizardmen's Great Plan to its ultimate conclusion.

short_description.last_approved_text: The most irregular weapons are reserved for Terradon Riders, who are armed with poison-tipped javelins, fireleech bolas, and various other unusual ordnances.

technologies.short_description: The most irregular weapons are reserved for Terradon Riders, who are armed with poison-tipped javelins, fireleech bolas, and various other unusual ordnances.

short_description.last_approved_text: The ferocious, predatory Cold Ones can be trained so their savage natures are exploited to the Lizardmen's best advantage.

technologies.short_description: The ferocious, predatory Cold Ones can be trained so their savage natures are exploited to the Lizardmen's best advantage.

short_description.last_approved_text: Once the foe's blood begins to flow the Cold Ones go into near-uncontrollable frenzy.

technologies.short_description: Once the foe's blood begins to flow the Cold Ones go into near-uncontrollable frenzy.

onscreen_name.last_approved_text: Sequence of the Great Beast's Resilience

technologies.onscreen_name: Sequence of the Great Beast's Resilience

short_description.last_approved_text: Slow-moving but deadly, the Living Bastions of Lustria's armies can be made even tougher by following the Old Ones' teachings.

technologies.short_description: Slow-moving but deadly, the Living Bastions of Lustria's armies can be made even tougher by following the Old Ones' teachings.

onscreen_name.last_approved_text: Sequence of the Great Beast's Rampage

technologies.onscreen_name: Sequence of the Great Beast's Rampage

short_description.last_approved_text: It's best to stay out of a Stegadon's way if you don't want to be trampled or gored, no matter whose side you are on.

technologies.short_description: It's best to stay out of a Stegadon's way if you don't want to be trampled or gored, no matter whose side you are on.

short_description.last_approved_text: Fresh quadruped 'recruits' are always required when war comes to Lustria's jungle shores.

technologies.short_description: Fresh quadruped 'recruits' are always required when war comes to Lustria's jungle shores.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Lack of food can be a great motivator.

technologies.short_description: Lack of food can be a great motivator.

short_description.last_approved_text: Casualties mean little when your population literally breed like rats.

technologies.short_description: Casualties mean little when your population literally breed like rats.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tide of monstrous rats flowed over them one by one, dragging them down to be torn apart…

technologies.short_description: The tide of monstrous rats flowed over them one by one, dragging them down to be torn apart…

short_description.last_approved_text: Large numbers of ill-trained, ill-equipped warriors can still perform a useful function.

technologies.short_description: Large numbers of ill-trained, ill-equipped warriors can still perform a useful function.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is always value in a lightning strike to harvest useful items, whatever they may be.

technologies.short_description: There is always value in a lightning strike to harvest useful items, whatever they may be.

short_description.last_approved_text: Yes-yes, take all of it! Yes, all - we can split-divide the spoils later- trust me, yes-yes!

technologies.short_description: Yes-yes, take all of it! Yes, all - we can split-divide the spoils later- trust me, yes-yes!

short_description.last_approved_text: We are the Children of the Horned Rat, survivors all and as we were here before you, so shall we be present to see you fall.

technologies.short_description: We are the Children of the Horned Rat, survivors all and as we were here before you, so shall we be present to see you fall.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: It means nothing if Skavenslaves die meeting a quota, there will always be more - many more - where they came from.

technologies.short_description: It means nothing if Skavenslaves die meeting a quota, there will always be more - many more - where they came from.

short_description.last_approved_text: If you want something done right, it's best to publicly kill the one who did it wrong so the others learn.

technologies.short_description: If you want something done right, it's best to publicly kill the one who did it wrong so the others learn.

short_description.last_approved_text: Woe betide any who raise their voices to decry, or even question, the decisions of their betters.

technologies.short_description: Woe betide any who raise their voices to decry, or even question, the decisions of their betters.

short_description.last_approved_text: Needless to say, any Clanrats with ideas above their stations are quickly, and permanently, silenced.

technologies.short_description: Needless to say, any Clanrats with ideas above their stations are quickly, and permanently, silenced.

short_description.last_approved_text: Their vast network of underground tunnels enable the Skaven to move around the world largely undetected.

technologies.short_description: Their vast network of underground tunnels enable the Skaven to move around the world largely undetected.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Whereby war's notional rulebook is tossed away in favour of unbridled, fiendish savagery.

technologies.short_description: Whereby war's notional rulebook is tossed away in favour of unbridled, fiendish savagery.

short_description.last_approved_text: We-us get in there and kill-slay until they're mostly all dead, then we get out again - let second wave mop up, yes-yes!

technologies.short_description: We-us get in there and kill-slay until they're mostly all dead, then we get out again - let second wave mop up, yes-yes!

short_description.last_approved_text: Unsurprisingly, even more shouting, combined with terrible punishments, does tend to yield the desired results.

technologies.short_description: Unsurprisingly, even more shouting, combined with terrible punishments, does tend to yield the desired results.

short_description.last_approved_text: What to do when the agent you require works for another clan, who clearly do not appreciate his talents?

technologies.short_description: What to do when the agent you require works for another clan, who clearly do not appreciate his talents?

short_description.last_approved_text: There is nowhere to hide, nowhere safe to conspire, that isn't watched by agents of the Council.

technologies.short_description: There is nowhere to hide, nowhere safe to conspire, that isn't watched by agents of the Council.

short_description.last_approved_text: The advanced skills Skaven assassins learn in the Far East appear quite alien, but are no less effective when practised at home.

technologies.short_description: The advanced skills Skaven assassins learn in the Far East appear quite alien, but are no less effective when practised at home.

short_description.last_approved_text: It's difficult to imagine the Skaven concept of malfeasance, but it must exist; ‘criminals’ are put to work, as an alternative to an agonising death.

technologies.short_description: It's difficult to imagine the Skaven concept of malfeasance, but it must exist; ‘criminals’ are put to work, as an alternative to an agonising death.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Born from the fusion of Skaven with a range of horrific creatures, Rat Ogres are bereft of reason and almost devoid of sanity.

technologies.short_description: Born from the fusion of Skaven with a range of horrific creatures, Rat Ogres are bereft of reason and almost devoid of sanity.

short_description.last_approved_text: A misshapen mountain of flesh and muscle, with mechanical parts grafted on. Very nasty.

technologies.short_description: A misshapen mountain of flesh and muscle, with mechanical parts grafted on. Very nasty.

short_description.last_approved_text: A host of holy horrors to direct our aimless dance.

technologies.short_description: A host of holy horrors to direct our aimless dance.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: A little more nightshade, a little less mandrake… good-perfect, Lizard-things won't stand a chance, yes-yes!

technologies.short_description: A little more nightshade, a little less mandrake… good-perfect, Lizard-things won't stand a chance, yes-yes!

short_description.last_approved_text: No corruption too great, no disease too foul; if the Skaven want territory above-ground they will stop at nothing to acquire it.

technologies.short_description: No corruption too great, no disease too foul; if the Skaven want territory above-ground they will stop at nothing to acquire it.

short_description.last_approved_text: To make the foe see, hear and smell something else entirely, and then exploit their confusion - that's war taken to the next level.

technologies.short_description: To make the foe see, hear and smell something else entirely, and then exploit their confusion - that's war taken to the next level.

short_description.last_approved_text: All the screams, the contortions, the howls of agony don't mean much unless the end result is useable and, more importantly, repeatable.

technologies.short_description: All the screams, the contortions, the howls of agony don't mean much unless the end result is useable and, more importantly, repeatable.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: A wise warlord stockpiles ammunition long before it is needed.

technologies.short_description: A wise warlord stockpiles ammunition long before it is needed.

short_description.last_approved_text: It's always best to test a new concoction before unleashing it on the enemy.

technologies.short_description: It's always best to test a new concoction before unleashing it on the enemy.

short_description.last_approved_text: It’s hard to imagine, but there are some among this most venal, treacherous race who don't quite make the grade or indeed live much longer…

technologies.short_description: It’s hard to imagine, but there are some among this most venal, treacherous race who don't quite make the grade or indeed live much longer…

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: Those who display a willingness to betray their own, and just the right amount of vicious savagery, find themselves progressing within the Skaven hierarchy.

technologies.short_description: Those who display a willingness to betray their own, and just the right amount of vicious savagery, find themselves progressing within the Skaven hierarchy.

short_description.last_approved_text: Masks and armoured suits are useful, not just for protecting Skaven from the enemy, but also from their own crazy contraptions...

technologies.short_description: Masks and armoured suits are useful, not just for protecting Skaven from the enemy, but also from their own crazy contraptions...

short_description.last_approved_text: Bad workmen are the same the world over…

technologies.short_description: Bad workmen are the same the world over…

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

short_description.last_approved_text: There is always high demand for assassins willing to murder for someone who needs to keep their own hands clean.

technologies.short_description: There is always high demand for assassins willing to murder for someone who needs to keep their own hands clean.

short_description.last_approved_text: It's easier to influence matters when many above ground don't believe you exist...

technologies.short_description: It's easier to influence matters when many above ground don't believe you exist...

short_description.last_approved_text: The small number who survive the vigorous selection process are well equipped and given a share of the spoils to ensure their future loyalty.

technologies.short_description: The small number who survive the vigorous selection process are well equipped and given a share of the spoils to ensure their future loyalty.

short_description.last_approved_text: Fear of being dragged away and killed is another great motivator.

technologies.short_description: Fear of being dragged away and killed is another great motivator.

short_description.last_approved_text: If you wish to survive the turbulent, cutthroat world of Skaven politics you need loyal warriors on your side.

technologies.short_description: If you wish to survive the turbulent, cutthroat world of Skaven politics you need loyal warriors on your side.

short_description.last_approved_text: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to its ultimate conclusion.

technologies.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to its ultimate conclusion.

short_description.last_approved_text: Skaven covet Warpstone above all else; the ability to mutate weeds out the weak and strengthens those who are already strong.

technologies.short_description: Skaven covet Warpstone above all else; the ability to mutate weeds out the weak and strengthens those who are already strong.

short_description.last_approved_text: Selective breeding and genetic manipulation will breed the strongest Skaven yet.

technologies.short_description: Selective breeding and genetic manipulation will breed the strongest Skaven yet.

short_description.last_approved_text: For centuries, this tome of beasts has been required reading for Necromancers who wish ultimate control, training and mastery of the dread creatures that lurk by the graveside.

technologies.short_description: For centuries, this tome of beasts has been required reading for Necromancers who wish ultimate control, training and mastery of the dread creatures that lurk by the graveside.

long_description.last_approved_text: To blight the trees, blacken and twist them, is to create the perfect surrounding for creatures that skulk with the Undead. This may be wolves with black hearts or those who are dead already, or Fell Bats resting between feedings of blood and the bodies of domestic cats.

technologies.long_description: To blight the trees, blacken and twist them, is to create the perfect surrounding for creatures that skulk with the Undead. This may be wolves with black hearts or those who are dead already, or Fell Bats resting between feedings of blood and the bodies of domestic cats.

short_description.last_approved_text: The darker and more haunted the forests become, the better the habitat for fell creatures.

technologies.short_description: The darker and more haunted the forests become, the better the habitat for fell creatures.

long_description.last_approved_text: De Noirot's tome contains many rants about entering the minds of the fauna and dominating each creature, forcing them to work as one. There are more efficient ways. By taking control of the most powerful of these creatures the lesser beasts will follow - the true secret to how Vampires can summon and be enveloped by such swarms.

technologies.long_description: De Noirot's tome contains many rants about entering the minds of the fauna and dominating each creature, forcing them to work as one. There are more efficient ways. By taking control of the most powerful of these creatures the lesser beasts will follow - the true secret to how Vampires can summon and be enveloped by such swarms.

short_description.last_approved_text: To become Master of Swarms is to dominate each creature within the flock, so they sway to his control.

technologies.short_description: To become Master of Swarms is to dominate each creature within the flock, so they sway to his control.

long_description.last_approved_text: To glean obedience from the notoriously feral Dire Wolves is to become the alpha whom they follow. The iron will of Vampires and Necromancers alike can achieve this through strength of mind, but the bestiary provides other, more efficient methods to make the hounds eager to join the fray and fight on the reader's behalf.

technologies.long_description: To glean obedience from the notoriously feral Dire Wolves is to become the alpha whom they follow. The iron will of Vampires and Necromancers alike can achieve this through strength of mind, but the bestiary provides other, more efficient methods to make the hounds eager to join the fray and fight on the reader's behalf.

short_description.last_approved_text: Contained in this passage of De Noirot's tome are methods of usurping the alpha beast of the pack.

technologies.short_description: Contained in this passage of De Noirot's tome are methods of usurping the alpha beast of the pack.

long_description.last_approved_text: Vargheists were once true von Carsteins, but they have long since lost their noble trappings, becoming desperate beasts and useful tools for Vampires that retain their intellect. According to the bestiary, there is a cantrip that ensures that Vargheists will forever hunger - a despairing hunger that keeps them fierce and desperate to eat.

technologies.long_description: Vargheists were once true von Carsteins, but they have long since lost their noble trappings, becoming desperate beasts and useful tools for Vampires that retain their intellect. According to the bestiary, there is a cantrip that ensures that Vargheists will forever hunger - a despairing hunger that keeps them fierce and desperate to eat.

short_description.last_approved_text: When Vargheists emerge from their tomb-like cocoons, they have a great hunger - this cantrip ensures it never slakes.

technologies.short_description: When Vargheists emerge from their tomb-like cocoons, they have a great hunger - this cantrip ensures it never slakes.

long_description.last_approved_text: Vampires deprived of blood inevitably start to change, their human form slipping to reveal the true monster underneath. They become more bestial, feral creatures. These half-breeds can be controlled by a Vampire that is fully in control of his form or even a Necromancer, when the right words of power are spoken. The beasts are drawn to beings with such dominance.

technologies.long_description: Vampires deprived of blood inevitably start to change, their human form slipping to reveal the true monster underneath. They become more bestial, feral creatures. These half-breeds can be controlled by a Vampire that is fully in control of his form or even a Necromancer, when the right words of power are spoken. The beasts are drawn to beings with such dominance.

short_description.last_approved_text: There are words of power to control Vampires that have been lost to the bestial side hidden within them.

technologies.short_description: There are words of power to control Vampires that have been lost to the bestial side hidden within them.

long_description.last_approved_text: Long is the tradition of the blood hunts. The Midnight Aristocracy do not seek out game or boar, like their mortal peers in the Empire. No, it is the smallfolk that are hunted for sport, set loose in the forests with Dire Wolves and Varghulfs quickly on their scent. A terrifying way to die, but that matters not because it makes for better pets.

technologies.long_description: Long is the tradition of the blood hunts. The Midnight Aristocracy do not seek out game or boar, like their mortal peers in the Empire. No, it is the smallfolk that are hunted for sport, set loose in the forests with Dire Wolves and Varghulfs quickly on their scent. A terrifying way to die, but that matters not because it makes for better pets.

short_description.last_approved_text: Beasts that are already blooded, that know the thrill of hunting living things, will always be the superior breed.

technologies.short_description: Beasts that are already blooded, that know the thrill of hunting living things, will always be the superior breed.

long_description.last_approved_text: If the Varghulfs and Vargheists' ravenous appetites cannot be kept in check between battles they can become burdensome to control. Wise masters will keep a supply of fresh, preferably still-living prey, ready should the Vampires beasts become all but impossible to control. This maybe a cage of 'breathers' kept within reach for such an occasion or even simply the location of a farmstead or hamlet. Either way, the poor subjects are doomed.

technologies.long_description: If the Varghulfs and Vargheists' ravenous appetites cannot be kept in check between battles they can become burdensome to control. Wise masters will keep a supply of fresh, preferably still-living prey, ready should the Vampires beasts become all but impossible to control. This maybe a cage of 'breathers' kept within reach for such an occasion or even simply the location of a farmstead or hamlet. Either way, the poor subjects are doomed.

short_description.last_approved_text: A fresh supply of meat or at least knowledge of where to find it, usually some poor Sylvanian hamlet, keeps these beasts pliant.

technologies.short_description: A fresh supply of meat or at least knowledge of where to find it, usually some poor Sylvanian hamlet, keeps these beasts pliant.

long_description.last_approved_text: The titanic and monstrous Terrorgheists haunt caverns deep in Sylvania's wretched forests and mountains. They are not easy creatures to dominate - only the most determined Beastmaster will try - and yet De Noirot discovered a means to enhance these monsters, making them even deadlier and more terrifying when on the hunt or in battle.

technologies.long_description: The titanic and monstrous Terrorgheists haunt caverns deep in Sylvania's wretched forests and mountains. They are not easy creatures to dominate - only the most determined Beastmaster will try - and yet De Noirot discovered a means to enhance these monsters, making them even deadlier and more terrifying when on the hunt or in battle.

short_description.last_approved_text: A Terrorgheist feeds by terrifying its prey into paralysis, this invocation invigorates the monster further.

technologies.short_description: A Terrorgheist feeds by terrifying its prey into paralysis, this invocation invigorates the monster further.

short_description.last_approved_text: A text of powerful binding and one of the nine Books of Nagash. It contains countless rituals to ensnare wrathful spirits, summon ghoulish creatures and imbue such fell things with dread power.

technologies.short_description: A text of powerful binding and one of the nine Books of Nagash. It contains countless rituals to ensnare wrathful spirits, summon ghoulish creatures and imbue such fell things with dread power.

long_description.last_approved_text: Ushoran was one of the first Vampires, a great warrior and diplomat of Lahmia. However, that was many millennia ago. Over his long life the Vampire rose to greatness, but suffered damnation as a ghoulish Vampire creature, the progenitor of the Strigoi. A specific ritual is said to summon his spirit and imbue all of Ghoul-kind with his hunger.

technologies.long_description: Ushoran was one of the first Vampires, a great warrior and diplomat of Lahmia. However, that was many millennia ago. Over his long life the Vampire rose to greatness, but suffered damnation as a ghoulish Vampire creature, the progenitor of the Strigoi. A specific ritual is said to summon his spirit and imbue all of Ghoul-kind with his hunger.

short_description.last_approved_text: Ushoran was the first Ghoul King; his spirit can be invoked with the right words, and his children summoned.

technologies.short_description: Ushoran was the first Ghoul King; his spirit can be invoked with the right words, and his children summoned.

long_description.last_approved_text: Ghouls and their larger kin mainly hunt in packs. They may have once been of men, generations ago, but are now little better than beasts. Yet by inscribing a disgusting mark of power on the ground and eating one of their own - usually the weakest of the pack - the Ghouls' claws grow even deadlier.

technologies.long_description: Ghouls and their larger kin mainly hunt in packs. They may have once been of men, generations ago, but are now little better than beasts. Yet by inscribing a disgusting mark of power on the ground and eating one of their own - usually the weakest of the pack - the Ghouls' claws grow even deadlier.

short_description.last_approved_text: Bestial chants around fell markings, eating their own, ghoulish kind.

technologies.short_description: Bestial chants around fell markings, eating their own, ghoulish kind.

long_description.last_approved_text: There are many dead languages in the world, some of which have been recorded and etched in dried blood on the pages of the Liber Necronomica. One such litany, when uttered using the exact pronunciations, can summon ethereal hosts to the speaker. However, if just one syllable is misspoken the summoner will be devoured by the spirits, rather than have them serve him.

technologies.long_description: There are many dead languages in the world, some of which have been recorded and etched in dried blood on the pages of the Liber Necronomica. One such litany, when uttered using the exact pronunciations, can summon ethereal hosts to the speaker. However, if just one syllable is misspoken the summoner will be devoured by the spirits, rather than have them serve him.

short_description.last_approved_text: Using a litany from a language not spoken for generations, the speaker can bind malevolent spirits to his cause.

technologies.short_description: Using a litany from a language not spoken for generations, the speaker can bind malevolent spirits to his cause.

long_description.last_approved_text: The dead do not tire, nor do they need sustenance - that is an affliction of the living. Nevertheless, they are bound to travel only as quickly as they can put one rotting leg in front of the other. Infusing the hordes with this incantation will speed up the Undead marchers, although has to be limited lest their legs be worn away!

technologies.long_description: The dead do not tire, nor do they need sustenance - that is an affliction of the living. Nevertheless, they are bound to travel only as quickly as they can put one rotting leg in front of the other. Infusing the hordes with this incantation will speed up the Undead marchers, although has to be limited lest their legs be worn away!

short_description.last_approved_text: This incantation quickens the pace of the hordes over great distances. Forever marching, never tiring.

technologies.short_description: This incantation quickens the pace of the hordes over great distances. Forever marching, never tiring.

long_description.last_approved_text: The legacy of the Strigoi runs deep among Ghoul-kind for it was at Mourkain, capital of the Strygos Empire, when they were at the pinnacle of their power. Now, the remnants of that bloodline scavenge amidst the Ghouls, awaiting a return to greatness. It is a racial memory that can be implanted into all Crypt Ghouls, if the correct rituals are used.

technologies.long_description: The legacy of the Strigoi runs deep among Ghoul-kind for it was at Mourkain, capital of the Strygos Empire, when they were at the pinnacle of their power. Now, the remnants of that bloodline scavenge amidst the Ghouls, awaiting a return to greatness. It is a racial memory that can be implanted into all Crypt Ghouls, if the correct rituals are used.

short_description.last_approved_text: The book implants racial memories of Mourkain, Ushoran and Kadon to haunt the creatures' waking dreams.

technologies.short_description: The book implants racial memories of Mourkain, Ushoran and Kadon to haunt the creatures' waking dreams.

long_description.last_approved_text: A Necromancer must be confident in his abilities to summon Wraiths back from the dead. For, unlike other minions, they hold on to a vestige of intelligence and cunning, and will happily reap the summoner's dread soul if not properly bound. However, a further unholy psalm spoken during the summoning can make these spirits even fiercer and more determined to harvest the spirits of the living.

technologies.long_description: A Necromancer must be confident in his abilities to summon Wraiths back from the dead. For, unlike other minions, they hold on to a vestige of intelligence and cunning, and will happily reap the summoner's dread soul if not properly bound. However, a further unholy psalm spoken during the summoning can make these spirits even fiercer and more determined to harvest the spirits of the living.

short_description.last_approved_text: Behold the reapers - summoned from their cairns to enact the doom of all mortals!

technologies.short_description: Behold the reapers - summoned from their cairns to enact the doom of all mortals!

long_description.last_approved_text: To be besieged by the dead is to know that the enemy can wait for eternity for your capitulation, should they wish; they do not need to eat, nor will they suffer thirst or disease. But its their war engines that can really shatter a siege - machines of bone that launch the laughing skulls of giants or fire bolts of necromantic energy against the castle walls.

technologies.long_description: To be besieged by the dead is to know that the enemy can wait for eternity for your capitulation, should they wish; they do not need to eat, nor will they suffer thirst or disease. But its their war engines that can really shatter a siege - machines of bone that launch the laughing skulls of giants or fire bolts of necromantic energy against the castle walls.

short_description.last_approved_text: The enemy should fear the war engines of the dead, as screaming skulls fly over the ramparts!

technologies.short_description: The enemy should fear the war engines of the dead, as screaming skulls fly over the ramparts!

long_description.last_approved_text: An Undead horde is not made purely from the freshly-dead, many have ancient Chieftains in their ranks. Enshrining or glorifying such creatures, be they Wight Kings or Skeletal Champions, has little effect on the Undead creatures they fight, but can have a morale-sapping effect on mortals still laden with fragilities such as pride and cowardice.

technologies.long_description: An Undead horde is not made purely from the freshly-dead, many have ancient Chieftains in their ranks. Enshrining or glorifying such creatures, be they Wight Kings or Skeletal Champions, has little effect on the Undead creatures they fight, but can have a morale-sapping effect on mortals still laden with fragilities such as pride and cowardice.

short_description.last_approved_text: To enshrine an Ancient Lord of the Horde is to show the mortals just how fragile their own petty lives are.

technologies.short_description: To enshrine an Ancient Lord of the Horde is to show the mortals just how fragile their own petty lives are.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Liber Necronomica has many rituals that not only summon spiritual malefactors, but shackle them to the Necromancer's will also. This keeps them convalescent far longer than intended in the initial summoning. The Wraiths' malign, if stilted, intellect will no doubt learn from prolonged exposure to their summoner's foes.

technologies.long_description: The Liber Necronomica has many rituals that not only summon spiritual malefactors, but shackle them to the Necromancer's will also. This keeps them convalescent far longer than intended in the initial summoning. The Wraiths' malign, if stilted, intellect will no doubt learn from prolonged exposure to their summoner's foes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Shackling Wraiths via arcane means keeps their spirits tethered longer to the mortal plane.

technologies.short_description: Shackling Wraiths via arcane means keeps their spirits tethered longer to the mortal plane.

short_description.last_approved_text: Said to be transcribed from scrolls of Neferata herself, this grave codex instructs recently-sired Vampires in the art of infiltrating, influencing and spreading the Vampiric curse across the world.

technologies.short_description: Said to be transcribed from scrolls of Neferata herself, this grave codex instructs recently-sired Vampires in the art of infiltrating, influencing and spreading the Vampiric curse across the world.

long_description.last_approved_text: As a Vampire's forces take control of mortal settlements, the living must quickly adapt to their pitiful new lives, for they may not be living for much longer. The Undead Lord could demand that all be slain and risen as zombies by the next moon rise. But Vampires that cling to their noble trappings prefer to have some 'breathers' about - to terrorise and dominate. Ask the smallfolk of Sylvania...

technologies.long_description: As a Vampire's forces take control of mortal settlements, the living must quickly adapt to their pitiful new lives, for they may not be living for much longer. The Undead Lord could demand that all be slain and risen as zombies by the next moon rise. But Vampires that cling to their noble trappings prefer to have some 'breathers' about - to terrorise and dominate. Ask the smallfolk of Sylvania...

onscreen_name.last_approved_text: Serve in Life or in Death

technologies.onscreen_name: Serve in Life or in Death

short_description.last_approved_text: Fear is a great motivator. The living within the captured settlement must appease their new lord.

technologies.short_description: Fear is a great motivator. The living within the captured settlement must appease their new lord.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Book of Blood contains evil rituals designed to spread Dark Magic ever outwards. Such incantations are performed at Morrslieb's height, with the leering face of the dark moon staring down into the Vampire Count's gothic castle. With a deathly thrum - like that of a Mortis Engine - the ritual concludes and so the touch of Vampiric corruption spreads, withering flora and bringing death and famine.

technologies.long_description: The Book of Blood contains evil rituals designed to spread Dark Magic ever outwards. Such incantations are performed at Morrslieb's height, with the leering face of the dark moon staring down into the Vampire Count's gothic castle. With a deathly thrum - like that of a Mortis Engine - the ritual concludes and so the touch of Vampiric corruption spreads, withering flora and bringing death and famine.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Vampires' baleful rituals are enacted to ensure the spread of Undeath.

technologies.short_description: The Vampires' baleful rituals are enacted to ensure the spread of Undeath.

long_description.last_approved_text: From blood comes wealth, stature and power. Dark Magic may be the thing Vampires seek, but it is the blood of the living that sustains them. The Lahmian Book of Blood is full of Neferata's teachings on how to control her kin. The retention and giving of blood ensures loyalty, power and wealth.

technologies.long_description: From blood comes wealth, stature and power. Dark Magic may be the thing Vampires seek, but it is the blood of the living that sustains them. The Lahmian Book of Blood is full of Neferata's teachings on how to control her kin. The retention and giving of blood ensures loyalty, power and wealth.

short_description.last_approved_text: As the industry of Undeath grows, so do the dwellings of its Dark Lords. It is blood that drives this dread economy.

technologies.short_description: As the industry of Undeath grows, so do the dwellings of its Dark Lords. It is blood that drives this dread economy.

long_description.last_approved_text: Hexensnacht is also known as Witching Night, an evil phase of Morrslieb that marks the new year. Creatures of Chaos and darkness are invigorated at such a dark time, Tomb Banshees are imbued with extra strength and murderous need, and Wight Kings stand even more ready to harvest the living.

technologies.long_description: Hexensnacht is also known as Witching Night, an evil phase of Morrslieb that marks the new year. Creatures of Chaos and darkness are invigorated at such a dark time, Tomb Banshees are imbued with extra strength and murderous need, and Wight Kings stand even more ready to harvest the living.

short_description.last_approved_text: Witching Night is the best time for ritual sacrifice, for evil gods are awaiting such gifts at year's turn.

technologies.short_description: Witching Night is the best time for ritual sacrifice, for evil gods are awaiting such gifts at year's turn.

long_description.last_approved_text: Ever since Queen Neferata created the Elixir of Life there have been Vampires hidden in mortal societies. The Lahmians have always done it best, by inveigling themselves into high societies of the living and then subverting those in true power. While the Vampire Counts strike out from Sylvania, there are conclaves within other nations, allowing a fifth column to rise during the wars to come.

technologies.long_description: Ever since Queen Neferata created the Elixir of Life there have been Vampires hidden in mortal societies. The Lahmians have always done it best, by inveigling themselves into high societies of the living and then subverting those in true power. While the Vampire Counts strike out from Sylvania, there are conclaves within other nations, allowing a fifth column to rise during the wars to come.

short_description.last_approved_text: The tenets of Lahmia encourage Vampires to inveigle themselves into the mortal populace.

technologies.short_description: The tenets of Lahmia encourage Vampires to inveigle themselves into the mortal populace.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Knights of the Order of the Blood Dragon were amongst the first to be turned to Vampirism. Walach Harkon, apprentice to the legendary Vampire warrior Abhorash, challenged them to single combat, defeated each Knight one by one, and turned the ones that impressed him with their martial skills. Many others have since suffered a similar fate, forced to swear unholy oaths of fealty to a new Vampire liege and fight eternally in his name from atop their evil Nightmare steeds.

technologies.long_description: The Knights of the Order of the Blood Dragon were amongst the first to be turned to Vampirism. Walach Harkon, apprentice to the legendary Vampire warrior Abhorash, challenged them to single combat, defeated each Knight one by one, and turned the ones that impressed him with their martial skills. Many others have since suffered a similar fate, forced to swear unholy oaths of fealty to a new Vampire liege and fight eternally in his name from atop their evil Nightmare steeds.

short_description.last_approved_text: Defeated mortal Knights who fought valiantly are, on occasion, granted the Blood Kiss.

technologies.short_description: Defeated mortal Knights who fought valiantly are, on occasion, granted the Blood Kiss.

long_description.last_approved_text: Arguably, Vlad's greatest triumph was not the siege of Altdorf but before the Vampire Wars even started, when he spread his bloodline among the nobles of Sylvania under the Empire's nose. When he revealed himself it was largely too late for the Templars of Sigmar to react, the von Carstein powerbase had been established and has stubbornly refused to die out ever since. It is a viable strategy to this day.

technologies.long_description: Arguably, Vlad's greatest triumph was not the siege of Altdorf but before the Vampire Wars even started, when he spread his bloodline among the nobles of Sylvania under the Empire's nose. When he revealed himself it was largely too late for the Templars of Sigmar to react, the von Carstein powerbase had been established and has stubbornly refused to die out ever since. It is a viable strategy to this day.

short_description.last_approved_text: Some Vampires are masters of disguise, using their charm and magic to infiltrate powerful organisations and noble houses.

technologies.short_description: Some Vampires are masters of disguise, using their charm and magic to infiltrate powerful organisations and noble houses.

long_description.last_approved_text: A Vampire may gain followers in several ways - although he may simply create them by imparting the Blood Kiss to those he deems worthy, others may be drawn to his rise in power and stature. A test of their loyalty will whittle out the chaff from the useful. Those who pledge their allegiance may then be tasked with the continued quest for power, or so say the scriptures within the Book of Blood.

technologies.long_description: A Vampire may gain followers in several ways - although he may simply create them by imparting the Blood Kiss to those he deems worthy, others may be drawn to his rise in power and stature. A test of their loyalty will whittle out the chaff from the useful. Those who pledge their allegiance may then be tasked with the continued quest for power, or so say the scriptures within the Book of Blood.

short_description.last_approved_text: As a Vampire grows in dark majesty, others of evil intent will flock to this master, for they also crave power.

technologies.short_description: As a Vampire grows in dark majesty, others of evil intent will flock to this master, for they also crave power.

long_description.last_approved_text: The art of rebirth is a Lahmian technique, although one practised by Blood Dragons and von Carsteins, where a Vampire that has expelled much of his power or is particularly dehydrated is covered in the blood of a hated enemy to allow his complete revivification. This can take place in the his tomb or some other sanctuary, such as his Black Coach when on campaign.

technologies.long_description: The art of rebirth is a Lahmian technique, although one practised by Blood Dragons and von Carsteins, where a Vampire that has expelled much of his power or is particularly dehydrated is covered in the blood of a hated enemy to allow his complete revivification. This can take place in the his tomb or some other sanctuary, such as his Black Coach when on campaign.

short_description.last_approved_text: Returning to the sanctuary of his Black Coach, the Vampire will begin the Lahmian art of rebirth.

technologies.short_description: Returning to the sanctuary of his Black Coach, the Vampire will begin the Lahmian art of rebirth.

long_description.last_approved_text: All Vampires were once men, with hopes, dreams and families of their own. Though the Blood Kiss has turned them into twisted monsters, few can forget their past, mortal lives. Clinging to their old heraldic symbols, each one is clad in fine silk befitting of a lord or lady, and bestows titles of nobility upon their underlings. Although their ancestral castles crumble, each still boasts an opulent throne room from which the Midnight Aristocracy holds court.

technologies.long_description: All Vampires were once men, with hopes, dreams and families of their own. Though the Blood Kiss has turned them into twisted monsters, few can forget their past, mortal lives. Clinging to their old heraldic symbols, each one is clad in fine silk befitting of a lord or lady, and bestows titles of nobility upon their underlings. Although their ancestral castles crumble, each still boasts an opulent throne room from which the Midnight Aristocracy holds court.

short_description.last_approved_text: As its dark empire rots, the Midnight Aristocracy clings to pride and the fineries of nobility ever more strongly.

technologies.short_description: As its dark empire rots, the Midnight Aristocracy clings to pride and the fineries of nobility ever more strongly.

long_description.last_approved_text: Within the pages of Neferata's tome are strange indexes and word keys - the very tools that Neferata herself used to decipher Nagash's teachings. Of course, her methods were not entirely foolproof, as the Elixir of Life was a flawed creation. Yet the power to decipher the ancient manuscripts enables Vampires to learn secrets not recorded since Lahmia was at its height.

technologies.long_description: Within the pages of Neferata's tome are strange indexes and word keys - the very tools that Neferata herself used to decipher Nagash's teachings. Of course, her methods were not entirely foolproof, as the Elixir of Life was a flawed creation. Yet the power to decipher the ancient manuscripts enables Vampires to learn secrets not recorded since Lahmia was at its height.

short_description.last_approved_text: The Book of Blood contains indexes and lexiconic keys for deciphering ancient manuscripts said to hold true power.

technologies.short_description: The Book of Blood contains indexes and lexiconic keys for deciphering ancient manuscripts said to hold true power.

long_description.last_approved_text: Neferata, in her supreme arrogance, or perhaps a desire for recognition, wrote down her methods for ultimate control in the Book of Blood. At the height of her power, she was the spider at the centre of the web or - to use a more common analogy - the puppet master pulling the strings of her willing servants, as well as those not so... 'pliant'.

technologies.long_description: Neferata, in her supreme arrogance, or perhaps a desire for recognition, wrote down her methods for ultimate control in the Book of Blood. At the height of her power, she was the spider at the centre of the web or - to use a more common analogy - the puppet master pulling the strings of her willing servants, as well as those not so... 'pliant'.

short_description.last_approved_text: Pulling all the strings, his puppets are willing tools, ready to be used at their master's command.

technologies.short_description: Pulling all the strings, his puppets are willing tools, ready to be used at their master's command.

long_description.last_approved_text: The incantations of Nagash are the darkest of fell rituals, not to be used lightly if at all. For while they may ease the burden of Unlife, they can also act as a siren call to their original author. Nagash has been gone long from this world, but should he ever return then doom awaits us all!

technologies.long_description: The incantations of Nagash are the darkest of fell rituals, not to be used lightly if at all. For while they may ease the burden of Unlife, they can also act as a siren call to their original author. Nagash has been gone long from this world, but should he ever return then doom awaits us all!

short_description.last_approved_text: The darkest chapters within these pages are the incantations of Nagash, rituals that only the most powerful Vampires dare attempt.

technologies.short_description: The darkest chapters within these pages are the incantations of Nagash, rituals that only the most powerful Vampires dare attempt.

short_description.last_approved_text: Also known as the Tome of Bone, this dread volume, authored by Arkhan the Black, is filled with his secrets for instilling vigour and other deathly abilities into zombified and skeletal vessels.

technologies.short_description: Also known as the Tome of Bone, this dread volume, authored by Arkhan the Black, is filled with his secrets for instilling vigour and other deathly abilities into zombified and skeletal vessels.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Bond of Bones is a mantra first concocted by Arkhan the Black. When added to the traditional summoning rituals, Dark Magic becomes much stronger when seeking out skeletal remains. The cost, for there is always a cost in Dark Magic, is a sliver of the spellcaster's already maligned soul.

technologies.long_description: The Bond of Bones is a mantra first concocted by Arkhan the Black. When added to the traditional summoning rituals, Dark Magic becomes much stronger when seeking out skeletal remains. The cost, for there is always a cost in Dark Magic, is a sliver of the spellcaster's already maligned soul.

short_description.last_approved_text: Speaking this Dark Magic mantra will bring forth yet more skeletal remains.

technologies.short_description: Speaking this Dark Magic mantra will bring forth yet more skeletal remains.

long_description.last_approved_text: Those warriors who died in battle and have not had their arms and armour plundered may be buried with it - even if that means being flung into the same charnel pit as the rest of their regiment. This small invocation ensures such buried plate and mail rises to the surface at the same time the skeletons claw their way out of the grave.

technologies.long_description: Those warriors who died in battle and have not had their arms and armour plundered may be buried with it - even if that means being flung into the same charnel pit as the rest of their regiment. This small invocation ensures such buried plate and mail rises to the surface at the same time the skeletons claw their way out of the grave.

short_description.last_approved_text: The armour many soldiers are buried with is brought back to the surface - a gift from the grave.

technologies.short_description: The armour many soldiers are buried with is brought back to the surface - a gift from the grave.

long_description.last_approved_text: When entering the barrows of ancient warriors the trespasser must tread lightly, for their maybe booby-traps or more eldritch obstacles to prevent raiders. Even previous raiders who failed in their ransacking attempts come back to life as guardians - a bitter irony. However, defiling the barrow - using a guide within the Book of Arkhan - reveals secrets that can prolong the term of the ancient risen.

technologies.long_description: When entering the barrows of ancient warriors the trespasser must tread lightly, for their maybe booby-traps or more eldritch obstacles to prevent raiders. Even previous raiders who failed in their ransacking attempts come back to life as guardians - a bitter irony. However, defiling the barrow - using a guide within the Book of Arkhan - reveals secrets that can prolong the term of the ancient risen.

short_description.last_approved_text: Guided by Arkhan's text, the Necromancer enters the barrows he plunders, invoking ancient curses as he goes.

technologies.short_description: Guided by Arkhan's text, the Necromancer enters the barrows he plunders, invoking ancient curses as he goes.

long_description.last_approved_text: Hordes of Zombies and Skeletons rely on their numbers to overwhelm the foe, rather than skill-at-arms. Arkhan's book contains inscriptions that will ensure that champions of the past rise again to join the hordes. This ensures that martial prowess, as well as numbers, can bring about victory.

technologies.long_description: Hordes of Zombies and Skeletons rely on their numbers to overwhelm the foe, rather than skill-at-arms. Arkhan's book contains inscriptions that will ensure that champions of the past rise again to join the hordes. This ensures that martial prowess, as well as numbers, can bring about victory.

short_description.last_approved_text: Summoning long-lost warriors to join your shambling dead boosts the yearning hordes' capable champions.

technologies.short_description: Summoning long-lost warriors to join your shambling dead boosts the yearning hordes' capable champions.

long_description.last_approved_text: Arguably, the simplest Dark Magic rituals raise the newly dead as Zombies. Even then, a Necromancer must have been steeped in the Dark Arts for years. Yet hidden in the annotations of Arkhan's book is a single word invocation that toughens up Zombies' skin - a useful boon if the reader knows where in the tome to look.

technologies.long_description: Arguably, the simplest Dark Magic rituals raise the newly dead as Zombies. Even then, a Necromancer must have been steeped in the Dark Arts for years. Yet hidden in the annotations of Arkhan's book is a single word invocation that toughens up Zombies' skin - a useful boon if the reader knows where in the tome to look.

short_description.last_approved_text: A single-word boon, spoken during the ritual, will harden the skin of corpses as they jerk back to life.

technologies.short_description: A single-word boon, spoken during the ritual, will harden the skin of corpses as they jerk back to life.

long_description.last_approved_text: While not the best vessels for war, Zombies are a ready and easily accessible source for any budding Necromancer, especially during battle - as fresh corpses are constantly being 'created'. Those who wish to delve deeper can keep the newly-dead from rotting away by reading a whole sub-chapter in Arkhan's book on the subject, and so become an expert in the putrid hordes.

technologies.long_description: While not the best vessels for war, Zombies are a ready and easily accessible source for any budding Necromancer, especially during battle - as fresh corpses are constantly being 'created'. Those who wish to delve deeper can keep the newly-dead from rotting away by reading a whole sub-chapter in Arkhan's book on the subject, and so become an expert in the putrid hordes.

short_description.last_approved_text: Contained within, the secrets of holding together - quite literally - a rotting horde of Zombies.

technologies.short_description: Contained within, the secrets of holding together - quite literally - a rotting horde of Zombies.

long_description.last_approved_text: The mouldering banners of the von Carsteins and other bloodlines may sit hanging in decrepit castles, but standards fallen in battle are surprisingly hard to hoist again with skeletal hands - for the old gods, and even Khorne, find it an affront to the act of battle. Within Arkhan's Black Book are cantrips to ease such gods' wrath.

technologies.long_description: The mouldering banners of the von Carsteins and other bloodlines may sit hanging in decrepit castles, but standards fallen in battle are surprisingly hard to hoist again with skeletal hands - for the old gods, and even Khorne, find it an affront to the act of battle. Within Arkhan's Black Book are cantrips to ease such gods' wrath.

short_description.last_approved_text: To raise the ragged banners above the legions can be taxing, for they may have been enchanted by other sorcerers.

technologies.short_description: To raise the ragged banners above the legions can be taxing, for they may have been enchanted by other sorcerers.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Old World is littered with the detritus of war; armour, swords, axes can all be found by simply digging at the site of the battle - and such places are easy to stumble upon! It is harder is to find blades with ancient qualities, blades blessed by forgotten gods. This cantrip finds them, allowing the Necromancer to arm his more capable warriors with the best antiquity has to offer.

technologies.long_description: The Old World is littered with the detritus of war; armour, swords, axes can all be found by simply digging at the site of the battle - and such places are easy to stumble upon! It is harder is to find blades with ancient qualities, blades blessed by forgotten gods. This cantrip finds them, allowing the Necromancer to arm his more capable warriors with the best antiquity has to offer.

short_description.last_approved_text: A small cantrip can locate ancient blades upon an ancient battlefield long thought lost to time.

technologies.short_description: A small cantrip can locate ancient blades upon an ancient battlefield long thought lost to time.

long_description.last_approved_text: The Dread Animator is a shadowy presence appearing just above the left shoulder of a Necromancer. For an undisclosed price, he will whisper secrets into the spellcaster's ear that will invigorate even the most stubborn Wight back to his mortal remains for service in the Necromancer's legions.

technologies.long_description: The Dread Animator is a shadowy presence appearing just above the left shoulder of a Necromancer. For an undisclosed price, he will whisper secrets into the spellcaster's ear that will invigorate even the most stubborn Wight back to his mortal remains for service in the Necromancer's legions.

short_description.last_approved_text: The dread animator can wake the most stubborn of ancient warriors from their deathly slumber.

technologies.short_description: The dread animator can wake the most stubborn of ancient warriors from their deathly slumber.
